story:
What We Need & What You Get 

We need your votes! One vote is a $1 donation of support for our idea. Once we achieve (or surpass!) our goal of $500, we will donate all the funds collected by our class to Architecture for Humanity, which is a non-profit organization that uses their design skills to help communities throughout the world rebuild, often after disaster strikes.

The class we’re developing rebalance for is concept driven and not about a built product, so by funding rebalance you’re giving us a thumbs up that you think this idea is worth pursuing. Since we are not physically building the product at the end of our campaign, all of the money we raise will be donated to the non-profit organization Architecture for Humanity.

• When you contribute, in addition to that warm fuzzy feeling, you will receive a printable emotional wellbeing checklist or a printable baby gift box template created by our talented graphic designers! 

No matter how much money we raise, all the funds will go to Architecture for Humanity. We want to assist this groundbreaking organization in any way we can so they can continue to do the important work they do.

Who We Are and What We Do

We are rebalance! Our team consists of four Design MFA graduate students at California College of the Arts, and we’ve been working on a business project that aims to help young parents deal with the emotional challenges that arise after having a baby.

The statistics are telling: over 10 million young parents in the United States are suffering from some kind of significant emotional or mental stress due to parenthood and most of them are not receiving adequate help to assist them in this new phase in their lives. This imbalance in emotional/mental wellbeing is not just an individual problem - it’s a societal problem that affects everyone.  

Currently for parents who need help with emotional stress, the choices for mental health care are reading blogs and medical sites, or visiting a therapist in person. There is a need for a middle ground here for people who need a little help, but who aren’t seriously depressed. This middle ground essentially doesn’t exist today, and that’s where rebalance comes in: We offer a simple and enjoyable outlet for parents to de-stress, connect with other parents and feel better through a simple and delightful platform.

The site has 5 main areas:

•Heal - Therapeutic excercises based on Cognitive Behavioral Therapy

•Learn - Curated videos and articles about the mental health concerns most common to young parents, such as anxiety, stress and sadness.

•Share - An open forum for member to talk to each other and get support.

•Discover - A storehouse of ideas for activities with kids, organized around the time the parent has available, and their energy levels.

•Play - Fun activities like games, video and imagery chosen just for parents. 

The Impact

In speaking with a young mother she stated,  “…It’s been a scary experience of witnessing how a child can read your emotions. Your emotional state plays a huge role in the well-being of the child.”

Having a child is one of the greatest and most challenging experiences in life, and it should never be an experience that a person has to do alone and without support when things are difficult. rebalance is devoted to providing that assistive support for young parents when they need it, so they can guide themselves towards wellbeing. We are here to help them feel better. 

Why We're Doing This

From our research and personal experience, we’ve seen a great need for young parents to regain a sense of their purpose beyond just taking care of a little one, and to take control of their emotional and mental wellbeing. Deciding to take care of their health and happiness is one of the most important choices that young parents can make for themselves and their children for a lifetime.

Your contribution to rebalance doesn’t just help a business idea, it voices support for the many young parents out there who want to regain balance in their lives so that they can better raise their children; those children will contribute to the wellbeing of our world.

story:
What is Sailing Fitness Toolbox?

Sailing Fitness Toolbox is a training manual for all competitive sailors. It is based on cutting edge training techniques but presents them in an easy to follow format that any keen sailor can use. There are exercise programs for the specific needs of different groups of sailors, with workouts designed for high performance skiff sailors, hiking boat helms and offshore racing crews to name a few. There is advice on nutrition and hydration as well as mental training and injury prevention and chapters dedicated to disabled and youth sailors.

About the author

As a physiotherapist I have been privledged to work with some of the best sailors in the world, including the Swedish Olympic Sailing Team, where I helped them to secure gold and bronze medals in the sailing events at the London 2012 Olympics.

When I am not mending sailors, or writing about how to get better at sailing, I can be found out on the water foiling and racing in my International Moth. It is my love of sailing and my desire to help people achieve their goals on the water that prompted me to write Sailing Fitness Toolbox. To provide readers with a practical guide to help them improve in the sport they love. 

When can I read Sailing Fitness Toolbox?

The book has been written, training plans devised and a printer is on stand by with a press ready to roll. All that is needed now is your help with the printing costs to bring the project to life. The costs for setting up, printing and distributing, the first batch of books is £5000, which is where your help is needed. As soon as this campaign closes the presses will start rolling, with the first copies on their way to you hot off the press. If we don't reach the full total we will continue with a smaller print run.

The benfits for you

The better your sailing fitness, the better your sailing performance will be. Improved fitness means being able to hike for longer, trim harder, complete maneuvers more quickly, hoist and drop sails faster and avoid fatigue for longer; all of which means going faster all the way to the finish line.

Better sailing fitness means faster sailing, winning races, more enjoyment and fewer injuries. 

By supporting the project, you can be one of the first to get a copy of Sailing Fitness Toolbox - and get the edge over your opposition.

You don't have to be a sailor to participate in this project. By providing support you are not only helping me by bringing this project to life, but also helping all those who will benefit from the book. You will be helping youth sailors to start a long and injury free sailing career, helping elite athletes to fulfil their dreams of winnng medals and breaking records, inspiring those with disabilities to enter into an inspiring and life changing sport as well as enabling those who sail for the love of the sport to gain a bit more enjoyment from life. 

How you can help

You can help by, pre-ordering your copy of the book. We undersatnd that not everyone is in a position to support the project finacially but you can still help enormously by passing the message on to your friends, clubs, and crew mates and sharing the campaign on Facebook, Twitter and your blog.

Thank you in advance and see you on the water!

story:
My Story

My name is Holly Troy.  I am an artist, teacher, and alternative healer. I am so excited to be traveling to rural Peru to volunteer my services for the community there.


I need help in funding my trip! I will be traveling from August 13th - August 29th. 


I will be meeting with a group of alternative medical practitioners called Healer2Healer. Healer2Healer is an international organization based in New York City that brings volunteer alternative medicine practitioners - such as acupuncturists, Reiki practitioners, and medical massage therapists - to rural indigenous communities.
 
In addition to five days of Community Clinic in Cahuide where H2H participants will work with Western and alternative practitioners in triage to treat the expected 2,500 to 4,000 patients from the local area, we will:
·       Take part in indigenous ceremonies,
·       participate in perma-culture activities,
·       stay at and learn about The Paititi Institute for the Preservation for the Amazonian Rainforest and Indigenous Culture,
·       experience lectures about healing on many levels and modalities,

·       and study indigenous traditions and natural medicine.

 
This will be an opportunity for me to aid and learn from a population that is un(der)-represented and often marginalized. I will also have the chance to learn and deepen my own healing practice and skills, and evolve as a human/spiritual being. 


The Impact

This is a humanitarian volunteer effort with the potential to serve up to 4,000 people who come for physical and/or emotional help. 

On a broader scale, Healer2Healer helps indigenous people world-wide. The model is holistic - the impact is limitless. 

We are all connected. 

What We Need & What You Get

The funds I need go to cover my travel, lodging, and study materials. 

Since Healer2Healer is a non-profit without corporate sponsors, the cost of the tours come out of each individual practitioner's pocket. If I don't reach my funding goal, I will go into debt. At this time I do not have other funding sources.

What do you get in return for your generosity?

First of all, a HUGE THANK YOU!
 
And to show my gratitude, I am offering the following perks (which you will receive within 12 weeks of the last day of this fundraising event*):
 
$5.00 – THANK YOU!


$10.00 - a signed postcard of original artwork made by me inspired by my trip to Iquitos 

 
$25.00 - a signed postcard of original artwork made by me inspired by my trip to Iquitos AND a copy of my meditation CD Journey through the Chakras

 
$50.00 - a signed postcard of original artwork inspired by my trip to Iquitos made by me, a copy of my meditation CD Journey through the Chakras, AND a 20 minute distance reiki session

 
$100.00 - a signed postcard of original artwork inspired by my trip to Iquitos made by me, a copy of my meditation CD Journey through the Chakras, a 20 minute distance reiki session, and a bottle of Camu Gold

 
* $150.00 - 5 - class pass the the Flagstaff Yoga Festival happening on August 5 through 7, 2011. This perk is no longer available. 
 
$200.00 - a signed postcard of original artwork inspired by my trip to Iquitos made by me, a copy of my meditation CD Journey through the Chakras, a 20 minute distance reiki session, a bottle of Camu Gold, AND a 40 minute tarot reading


$250.00 - a signed postcard of original artwork inspired by my trip to Iquitos made by me, a copy of my meditation CD Journey through the Chakras, a 20 minute distance reiki session, a bottle of Camu Gold, a 40 minute tarot reading, AND an OM or Lotus Flower Pendant made by Matagi Sorensen of Sorensen Silver Fine Art, AND a bag of Rainforest Treasure Tea


$500.00 - a signed postcard of original artwork inspired by my trip to Iquitos made by me, a copy of my meditation CD Journey through the Chakras, a 20 minute distance reiki session, a bottle of Camu Gold, a 40 minute tarot reading, an OM or Lotus Pendant made by Matagi Sorensen of Sorensen Silver Fine Art, a bag of Rainforest Treasure Tea, AND a 12” x 12” original painting by me (my choice)


Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign with everyone you know. Even the smallest contribution is greatly appreciated!

story:
Help Kyle Smile!

Kyle is a 13 year-old boy that has dealt with more than most his age. Upon birth he was infected with Group B streptococcus. GBS is a type of bacterial infection that can be found in pregnant woman. The infection overtook his system and within hours his labored breathing became a life-threatening situation. All attempts to aid his tiny body failed and he was soon transferred from El Paso Texas to Lubbock for one last treatment to save his life. There he received extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (E.C.M.O) a technique of providing both cardiac and respiratory support oxygen to patients whose heart and lungs are so severely damaged that they can no longer serve their function. ECMO was the last option, Kyle’s last chance at life. With no certainty he was administered last rights. He remained on E.C.M.O for two weeks. Although he survived his ordeal the treatment left him with a developmental delay and a progressive hearing loss. We count our blessings - it could have been much worse.

Four years later Kyle developed Guillain-Barre syndrome; a disorder in which the body's immune system attacks the nerves. Weakness and tingling in the extremities are usually the first symptoms. Kyle progressively lost use of his limbs and could not walk and once again we found our child on a ventilator, struggling for life. He would once again find the strength to overcome adversity with the help of amazing medical professionals. Kyle went through rehabilitation to relearn how to walk and regain his strength.

Throughout his short life he has remained a positive thoughtful child. His hearing has gradually faded and he now uses hearing aids. He has fought adversity in school to overcome his learning disability. Although his hearing and eyesight have faltered his spirit has not.

Now Kyle is dealing with dental concerns. He is in need of orthodontic work to overcome a severe overbite and alignment problems. For a child with hearing aids and glasses he has never let others taunts and judgment bring him down yet his teeth do affect his confidence as much as the physical matter. 

What We Need & What You Get

There is a plan to correct his dental problem with a cost of $5,000. With all Kyle has endured over the years I don’t want the high cost to limit his treatment. I ask for help to ensure Kyle gets the treatment he needs. Any amount that can help offset the cost will help.

The Impact

I want Kyle to one day have the ability to smile broadly with confidence without concern for what others think. No need to cover his mouth or suppress his smile.

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand, not all of us have money to spare.  Here's how you can help:

  • Take up the cause.  Post the link to our site on Facebook, Twitter, or other social media sites.
  • Keep Kyle and all the other children in need to medical care in your prayers.

Thanks so very much for taking the time to read Kyle's story.  If we pull this off, it will be a result of caring generous people.  You'll have our eternal gratitude.

story:
Saturday, September 15th.

WAY TO GO, TEAM BRILLIANT!

Tuesday, September 11, 2012.

Here is Patti's facebook status after John's surgery follow up appointment.  "Did you hear that? That little sound? The one that sounded like a beautiful, tiny crystal hitting against another beautiful, tiny crystal in the wind? That was the sound of a single tear from Dr Dimples falling into his 6pm martini when he realized it will be a full six months until he sees us again."

Tuesday, September 5, 2012.  John is out of surgery and is resting! Everything went very well and we will update when we know more.  For now, THANK YOU for giving John a chance to go into surgery without the fear of overwhelming medical bills.  Love.

Tuesday, August 20, 2012.  John and Patti got the news today that John's cancer is STAGE ONE, and surgery will be scheduled soon.  This is the BEST that bad news can be, and we are all elated.  We are so close to reaching our goal of $100,000 to help cover the expenses of this necessary surgery.  THANK YOU. 

IF YOU ARE ONE OF THE INCREDIBLE DONORS WHO HAVE LIFTED THIS CAMPAIGN OFF THE GROUND, AND WISH TO BE INCLUDED IN A THANK YOU VIDEO, PLEASE SEND A PHOTO OF YOURSELF TO AMY AT AMYDMCCRACKEN@GMAIL.COM BEFORE SEPT. 10TH.  WE'LL POST THE VIDEO HERE FOR EVERYONE TO SEE. 

We are friends of Patti Digh and John Ptak.  We’ve been inspired by their writing, delighted by their stories, and enlightened by their wisdom.  After hearing about John’s diagnosis of kidney cancer—at a time when they are uninsured—many have asked: “How can we help?” 

Patti and John, and their two daughters, Emma and Tess, can focus on what is really important right now—getting and staying healthy—if we can help alleviate some of the overwhelming financial burden of his medical care.  This is how you can help.

Our goal is to raise $100,000.  While the exact costs of John’s treatment are unknown, it is clear that they will be extensive.  In fact, even though $100,000 is an extraordinary amount of money, it will probably not cover all the specialist consultations, hospitalization, treatment, and surgery expenses that John will incur as an uninsured patient.  Every dollar raised will be used to pay medical bills during John’s treatment. 

Every donation helps. 

We already know that we can count on the support of those of us who know and love—and have been touched by—this unique family.  And we are hoping that you will share this news, and your stories of John, Patti, Tess and Emma, with those you love—and ask for their support as well. 

Money won’t cure cancer.  But your support will encourage and allow John to follow an effective course of treatment without stressing over the daunting financial burden on his family. As John said in a recent e-mail, “whatever is . . . collected will be very helpful, because right now everything costs and will wind up costing everything . . . .”

We will be updating the site regularly with news and other ways to help.  Since John’s consultations with specialists have already begun, the best thing you can do is to donate whatever you can right now—and spread the word!


****During the first 12 hours of this campaign, we have raised $18,000.  Here is a note from John:

I just wanted to say a quick something here to everyone who has responded with such kindness and grace for my family and me, something quick because it is all so much, so overwhelming, that although I know where to begin I have no idea of how to end. It is all so incredible, all of you, all of the wonderful thoughts and words, and deeds, and charity. It is extremely humbling and happy, and shocking, to see so many hundreds of people contributing their thoughts and hopes and ideas and support. So, for tonight, I just want to say how much this enormous motion--this lifting wave--means to me, and what an almost unspeakably-great relief it is to have so so very many concerned for my family; and to say, for now, a simple "thank you". -John Ptak

Tuesday, August 20, 2012.  John and Patti got the news today that John's cancer is STAGE ONE, and surgery will be scheduled soon.  This is the BEST that bad news can be, and we are all elated.  We are so close to reaching our goal of $100,000 to help cover the expenses of this necessary surgery.  THANK YOU. 
IF YOU ARE ONE OF THE INCREDIBLE DONORS WHO HAVE LIFTED THIS CAMPAIGN OFF THE GROUND, AND WISH TO BE INCLUDED IN A THANK YOU VIDEO, PLEASE SEND A PHOTO OF YOURSELF TO AMY AT AMYDMCCRACKEN@GMAIL.COM BEFORE SEPT. 10TH.  WE'LL POST THE VIDEO HERE FOR EVERYONE TO SEE.  
We are friends of Patti Digh and John Ptak.  We’ve been inspired by their writing, delighted by their stories, and enlightened by their wisdom.  After hearing about John’s diagnosis of kidney cancer—at a time when they are uninsured—many have asked: “How can we help?” 
Patti and John, and their two daughters, Emma and Tess, can focus on what is really important right now—getting and staying healthy—if we can help alleviate some of the overwhelming financial burden of his medical care.  This is how you can help.
Our goal is to raise $100,000.  While the exact costs of John’s treatment are unknown, it is clear that they will be extensive.  In fact, even though $100,000 is an extraordinary amount of money, it will probably not cover all the specialist consultations, hospitalization, treatment, and surgery expenses that John will incur as an uninsured patient.  Every dollar raised will be used to pay medical bills during John’s treatment.  
Every donation helps. 
We already know that we can count on the support of those of us who know and love—and have been touched by—this unique family.  And we are hoping that you will share this news, and your stories of John, Patti, Tess and Emma, with those you love—and ask for their support as well. 
Money won’t cure cancer.  But your support will encourage and allow John to follow an effective course of treatment without stressing over the daunting financial burden on his family. As John said in a recent e-mail, “whatever is . . . collected will be very helpful, because right now everything costs and will wind up costing everything . . . .”
We will be updating the site regularly with news and other ways to help.  Since John’s consultations with specialists have already begun, the best thing you can do is to donate whatever you can right now—and spread the word!
****During the first 12 hours of this campaign, we have raised $18,000.  Here is a note from John:
I just wanted to say a quick something here to everyone who has responded with such kindness and grace for my family and me, something quick because it is all so much, so overwhelming, that although I know where to begin I have no idea of how to end. It is all so incredible, all of you, all of the wonderful thoughts and words, and deeds, and charity. It is extremely humbling and happy, and shocking, to see so many hundreds of people contributing their thoughts and hopes and ideas and support. So, for tonight, I just want to say how much this enormous motion--this lifting wave--means to me, and what an almost unspeakably-great relief it is to have so so very many concerned for my family; and to say, for now, a simple "thank you". -John Ptak

story:
I received a call from a long time friend and co-worker Francesca Ross last month.  I am sad to share she is battling cancer and is having a difficult time managing the side effects of chemotherapy treatments and accompanying medical costs.  She has been unemployed for two years and is a victim of our global recession. I have set a short term goal to raise $3000.00 to help pay for a one of her chemo therapy treatments.  Long term goal is to help raise enough money to allow her the financial freedom to focus her energy on healing.

Francesca graduated from U Penn and I had the privilege of meeting her when we started working at FedEx 21 years ago in downtown San Francisco.  We were hired together and shared several hysterical FedEx Sales and friendship moments at our headquarters in Memphis, TN, training, rallies, San Francisco and more…

My most fond memory is traveling to Europe exploring the countries of Amsterdam, Germany and Austria.  Francesca has always been driven; she experienced continued success in Sales at Yahoo during the dotcom era.  We have managed to remain connected each year and she is truly one of those few friends that we always pick-up right where we left off and chat, laugh, cry with, she is always is in your corner.

Francesca has two more chemo sessions and everything is overwhelming for her at this point.  She is too embarrassed to reach out to her friends and families for support, but I am not!! Please help me raise $3000 to allow Francesca Ross to focus ALL her energy on fighting cancer!!

story:
A simple phrase catalyzed our journey to reinvent the pillow: it's what's inside that counts. MUTU is the world's first pillow using a patent-pending air-suspension system instead of filler (foam and feathers) to guarantee you the healthiest, most energizing sleep ever. 

Sleep with MUTU and feel truly weightless. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

                                          

                                     

              

 

              

 

               

 

 

 

 

                

                      

                           

 

 

 

 

              

 

                                             

 

        

 

 

 

MUTU is composed of 5 main components:

Adjustable air-suspension cushions  

Ergonomic flexible membrane 

Perforated latex padding     

Custom-fit liner

Intuitive tag

 

 

 

MUTU uses silent-acting air-suspension cushions to absorb pressure while you rest, 

They can also be raised or lowered pneumatically to any height between 1.5 and 6 inches, depending on your sleeping preference. 

 

                  

 

These patent-pending air-suspension cushions have been grouped together into three clusters: left, right and centre. Each cluster can be adjusted independently:

  • Back sleepers might lower the central cluster to create a gentle valley for their head to rest 
  • Side sleepers might raise all clusters, to ensure their shoulders never compress, wherever they are on MUTU. 

 

 

 

 

 

An ergonomic membrane sits on top of the air-suspension cushions, which will bend and flex according to the height of each cushion. 

 

                     
 

 

The innovative patterned design of this membrane was created to provide firm but flexible support.

Pillows that are soft often don't provide enough support, and pillows that provide support, are too firm. The innovative patterned design of this membrane was created to make a hard material flexible, marrying the comfort of a soft pillow with the support of a firm one.

The membrane will flex to cradle your head while evenly dispersing pressure across its surface. This lets you to feel truly weightless. 

The membrane lies just below our natural latex padding, ensuring that your MUTU will never sag, lump or clump.

 

 

 

 

Our specially formulated latex padding is bacteriostatic and hypoallergenic. Our padding is also perforated to take advantage of MUTU's filler-less core and allow air to flow throughout the pillow's internals.

This added ventilation keeps MUTU cooler and fresher, for a more comfortable and hygienic sleep.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

                                                           
 

 

Our liner is 100% cotton and is custom made for MUTU, with 3 pull tags attached to it.

These pull tags are used to adjust the height of MUTUs 3 air-suspension clusters. 

 

                                                   
 

MUTU's pull tags make it super easy to adjust the height of your pillow:

  • To raise a suspension cluster, pull the tag while ensuring your head in not on the pillow
  • To lower a suspension cluster, pull the tag while your head is on the pillow
  • Release the tag to lock your desired height in place
     

It takes less than 4 seconds to fully inflate or fully deflate MUTU!

You'll be having the best sleep of your life in no time!

 

 
 

Once you've adjusted your MUTU it will stay locked at the height more more than a month, so feel free to put your own pillow case over the MUTU liner to match your personal bed-spread. 

 

  

 

 

"The prototype for this developed at @SydneyIncubate was the most comfortable pillow I ever tried, the production version looks great"  

@Mikenicholls88

"If you are like me and your feather pillow is never quite right and ruins your sleep, check our @mutupillow air suspension pillow. I got to try one in Sydney last year and I loved it 

 @Cboshuizen

"An adjustable pillow that wont sag nor get icky. Sleep peacefully and comfortably 

 @Sydneyincubate 

"Yasss to another great Aussie tech invention and possibly the best pillow launched

                        @MyThaiSpace                       

 

 

 

                                            

 

We have a true passion for pillows. Atleast for the one's that we're making. 

 

 

The idea behind MUTU began in 2016 as part of Suri's phD in Biomedical engineering.

Little did we know that we would soon be founder's of Australia's first pillow startup, being selected to be part of the Massachusetts Institute of Technology's Entrepreneurial Bootcamp  and the on-campus startup accelerator program INCUBATE.

Since then, we've been working to get you the best pillow you could ever dream of. 

 

A special thanks to those who collaborated with us along the way:

 

                 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

You will only be charged for shipping in July, once we know what destinations we are shipping to, and in what quantities. This is so that we can ensure we give you the fairest, cheapest, most accurate shipping price possible. We will collect your shipping details using a survey in July.

The table below lists the maximum cost of shipping to the below countries:

story:
ALOHA ENERGY
Energy Enhancement System

Hello, my name is Sean. My wife Kim and I are opening up a Rejuvenation Center in fabulous Las Vegas and we will be featuring the Energy Enhancement System by Dr. Sandra Rose Michael Ph.D.

We have been serving Las Vegas for over 5 and 1/2 years with our Pure Health Foods store. We have built up an amazing clientele of people who have become our friends. We have been recommending this technology to many of our customers, but until now there was no place in Las Vegas to send them. We have seen and heard many wonderful testimonials from people who have used the system elsewhere. We have also used the system and had healing and meditative experiences, and we want to share it with everyone!

We are creating a relaxing experience that can help people achieve amazing physical, mental and spiritual healing.

The Energy Enhancement SystemTM (EESystemTM) generates multiple bio-active life enhancing energy fields, including “scalar waves” which can allow cell regeneration, improve immune function, provide relief from pain, detoxify the body, elevate moods, and assist in balancing right and left hemispheres of the brain to increase energy levels.

This stunning technology,developed over 20 years by Dr. Sandra Rose Michael, Ph.D, DNM, DCSJl, uses custom-installed computers to generate morphogenic energy fields that can promote healing. The EESystem has been recognized at dozens of medical, scientific and professional conferences around the world.

The EESystem has been installed throughout the United States and internationally to promote wellness, healing, relaxation, purification and rejuvenation. This ecologically & environmentally safe system is used by individuals, doctors, and therapists as well as Meditation and Wellness Centers to improve human development and psychological well-being.

The Energy Enhancement System combines Body, Mind, Spirit, and Science to help you achieve peak performance and reach higher states of health, consciousness and self-actualization. The future is here.

We are giving some amazing deals to our contributors!

We are raising the money to create a center that looks as good as it makes you feel.

We want to install a beautiful CaliBamboo sustainable floor that looks beautiful and holds up to high traffic. 

We will be buying many anti-gravity chairs, and would like to able to buy the highest quality and most comfortable ones available.

We are painting the location with a non-toxic No VOC paint that looks great and is healthy for the environment and our visitors. 

SO, here is what we want to offer to the beautiful people that help us create our rejuvenation center.:

Huge discounts on sessions and the ability to bring a person with you for free!

All sessions are for 2 people unless otherwise specified.
All purchases will also receive one complimentary session.
Purchases of the IndieGoGo packages will enroll that person in our VIP program which will allow that person to receive deeper discounts, free passes or discounts to some of the future lectures and classes held in the EESystem and other perks to be named at a later date.

For the people that live out of state and can't travel to Las Vegas to enjoy the system, we are offering Medallions and Bracelets that are charged in the Energy Enhancement System and provide portable healing and EMF protecting benefits.

 

This is why...

The future of medicine and healing is coming, and I have never seen anything work for people as quickly and effectively as the EESystem. Everyday at out health food store we see people that are in desperate need of physical and mental healing and we want to provide this to them. So many are frustrated with their compromised health and are desperately searching for something that can increase the speed of the healing that they are desperately in need of.

If you can't help us now, please...

Share this with anyone and everyone you think might be interested or benefit from this.

If you want more information on the Energy Enhancement System:

http://eesystem.com/

story:
airtrader - avalanche respiration systems

Freeriders around the world! Good news ahead: A new swiss avalanche safety product is on it's way! I invented an avalanche respiration system called 'airtrader'! It allows you to breathe air under the snowpack of an avalanche and definitely increases the chance of survival. It is very easy-to-handle - if you get caught in an avalanche, you activate the system and can breathe for at least two hours!

Our mission simply is to reduce worldwide avalanche deaths by trading air to avalanche victims under the snowpack.

tom roos - inventor and founder

My name is Tom Roos from Switzerland and I love the mountains, snow and freeriding! As a kid I started skateboarding, when I was hurt I spent time at home building robots and experimenting in the technical world, then grew older and discovered surfing waves in the ocean and finally fell deeply in love with freeriding in the mountains. On this face It all begun, the last time we wanted to hike it it looked like this:

If one falls in love with mountains and the backcountry also a natural compassion for the mountains and their voice - the avalanches - arises. After graduating from University we had a monster-dump winter here in Switzerland and I woke up from a dream in which I had a very clear and detailled vision how to revolutionize avalanche safety; The idea for the airtrader was born! I spent two years researching and developing, founding and inventing the airtrader. My motivation is to revolutionize avalanche safety and I am fully committed to do so - that is why I am even selling my last belongings - like for example my old bug, a red Volkswagen Beetle from 1969 - in order to finance the start-up airtrader!

The crowdfunding campaign means a lot to me and I am very excited to see the resonance of the freeriding community - together we can make the backcountry a safer place for all of us and if you crowdfund you help saving lifes and make backcountry travels safer! Due to pending patent processes we can not tell you too much about how the airtrader works and looks like - you just gonna trust us that the system is revolutionizing avalanche safety, is not heavy at all, is very easy to handle, for sure will provide enough air to breathe even in extreme situations for a minimum of two hours and will not disturb while you're riding! And for sure you won't gonna loose the airtrader in an avalanche, because the airtrader is not a 'keep-a-hose-in-your-mouth-thing'. The airtrader will be available for riders with or without a helmet and there is no problem to travel on an airplane with it.

what we need

  We need your help to crowdfund the airtrader!

  • 25'000 euros are needed to start off with the production of the first airtrader respiration systems.
  • If we don't reach the mark of 25'000 euros we still keep on and try to find other ways to keep up our mission!

what you get

  • We offer you sweet deals if you help to crowdfund the airtrader! First of all your help will be remembered forever in the product-booklet in every airtrader box that will be sold - worldwide and for ever!
  • You get a life-long right of pre-emption on the first airtrader systems and for every follow-up products, max. 4 per crowdfunder!
  • You get a donation certificate, depending on your local laws a tax deduction is possible, because the money from the crowdfunding goes to the Swiss Avalanche Victims Prevention Association SAVPA which is supporting the production of the airtrader. And you help saving lifes!
  • You get invited to the test weekend in the Swiss Alps! (Travelcost, board and lodging not included.)
  • Check the deals in the boxes on the right side of this page - there you see what deals are offered if you help to crowdfund the airtrader!
  • For more information on what you exactly get as a crowdfunder check on more information on our webpage http://www.airtrader.ch
  • Last but not least you get a big THANK YOU from the airtrader team - without you we couldn't do it!

the impact

Your contribution counts! If you crowdfund you help creating a new state of the art in avalanche safety and your help will be rewarded!

  • It will save lifes in future winters!
  • Together we create a new safety standard for backcountry travels!
  • The airtrader does not mean that you can ride more crazy stuff than before it simply means that you have a better chance of survival if you get burried in an avalanche - keep that in mind guys!

other ways you can help

we totally understand that many snowbums out there can't contribute some money because the end of the season is near and so are the bank accounts of many snowbums! ;-)

You can help us still though:

  • Please share this indiegogo campaign or our homepage http://www.airtrader.ch with your freeriding friends and eventually with their moms and dads! ;-)
  • Please check out our facebookpage on facebook.com/airtrader and tell a friend!
  • You can share this campaign very easily with indiegogo's sharing tools!


Thank you very much for the help! And that’s all there is to it. Ride on!

     to crowdfund the airtrader! First of all your help will be remembered
     forever in the product-booklet in every airtrader box that will be sold - worldwide and
     for ever! 
You get a life-long right of pre-emption on the first airtrader systems and for every follow-up products, max. 4 per crowdfunder!

You get a donation certificate, depending on your local laws a tax deduction is possible, because the money from the crowdfunding goes to the Swiss Avalanche Victims Prevention Association SAVPA which is supporting the production of the airtrader. And you help saving lifes!
You get invited to the test weekend in the Swiss Alps! (Travelcost, board and lodging not included.)

Check the deals in the boxes on the right side of this page - there you see what deals are offered if you help to crowdfund the airtrader!
For more information on what you exactly get as a crowdfunder check on more information on our webpage http://www.airtrader.ch

Last but not least you get a big THANK YOU from the airtrader team - without you we couldn't do it!


the
impact
Your
contribution counts! If you crowdfund you help creating a new state of the art
in avalanche safety and your help will be rewarded! 

It will save lifes in future
     winters!
Together we create a new safety standard for backcountry travels!

The airtrader does not mean that you can ride more crazy stuff than before it simply means that you have a better chance of survival if you get burried in an avalanche - keep that in mind guys!

story: ,,,,,

Our  PLAN -IT LEAN software technology is an awesome tool that helps you  BLAST BELLY FAT........REVERSE  High Glucose.....and, Embrace incredible ENERGY! .... Bonus?...... say goodbye to bloating, gas and constipation!             

HOW TO START?

     Please Join our campaign to help REVERSE OBESITY AND DIABETES! 

With young adults traversing the slippery slope of what to eat, what's easy and readily available to nosh on, or just grabbing fast and easy "foods" 28% of American young adults are packing on the pounds faster than ever!

56% of all high schools in the U.S. offer vending machine food "stuff" which provides the bulk of the day's total calories to our teen.

70% of the drinks offered are sugary sodas...filling, yummy and tempting while packing on the fat and tilting the scale towards diabetes for our unsuspecting youth!

Plan-it Lean Lifeline Technology provides the education and guidance for our young adults alike to change their health positively for the rest of their lives! Our Goal? to give them endless possibilities to have an awesome life!

THROW YOURSELF, YOUR KIDS, & Those you CARE ABOUT A LIFELINE!

18% or 500,000 people in the U.S. have fatigue!

Fatigue, low energy, exhaustion are linked to immune abnormalities or infections.  Chronic fatigue is defined as severe fatigue that has been chronic for at least 6 months, is relieved by rest, and, is 4 times more prevalent in women than men.

Plan-it Lean

Throw Yourself a Lifeline with this "Smart"                   Technology

We  are campaigning to raise funding for Plan-it Lean's "Throw Yourself a Lifeline" technology. Plan-it Lean's affordable simple to use subscription based software program will give the user their private 24/7 online nutritionist!

The Lifeline software program guides, directs and teaches... step by step .... on how to blast belly fat, while losing fat faster than ever thought possible; plus, quickly reversing high glucose counts within days ultimately delivering "born again health" to the end user!  

Plan-it Lean's Lifeline technology will provide subscribers with a downloadable subscription based software program. The Plan-it Lean technology utilizes  a patented Applied Science of Nutrition Therapy delivering cornucopia of "lifestyle" options in the form of food "maps".  The Lifeline software brings to the table 1000's of food map variables. Algorithms calculate the correct number of calories, percentages, grams as well as "Units" the user requires daily to blast fat stores, reverse high glucose levels and bolster energy based on the users desired goal date.  Recommended daily lifestyle adjustments and personalized directives GUIDE & SHOW the user HOW TO achieve their specific target health goals ......be it BLAST FAT, REVERSE ADULT ONSET DIABETES, INCREASE ENERGY, ETC. within 6  weeks!

Our algorithm based software gives the subscriber their personalized 24/7, on line, always available "nutritionist".   The Plan-it Lean technology will be a Lifeline for millions of people to ultimately tip the scales of ill health by reversing adult onset diabetes, lowering HgA1C levels, blasting belly fat, bolstering energy, plus getting rid of GI and sleep problems--- these being just a few of the incredible long term health benefits of  Plan-it Lean's Throw Yourself a Lifeline technology!

So, the foundation of Plan-it Lean's technology is based on a few Ayurvedic principles....Please do read on....

How The Plan-it Lean "Throw Yourself a Lifeline" concept was born:

Upon opening her nutrition consulting practice AND experiencing a succession of client “fat loss” failures, Deborah threw the ADA Food Pyramid to the curb!  Intuitively knowing there had to be an answer somewhere to the myriad of escalating health problems across the planet ----- she discovered India and Ayurvedic Medicine!

Seeking far more than she ever learned from her Biochemistry and Food Science degree, Deborah traveled to India 9 times to study Ayurvedic Medicine. Intrigued by this renowned science long tenured as the Planets’ oldest healing modality---- and, spurred on by the knowledge that all other “healing” modalities (including allopathic western medicine) were “off shoots” of Ayurvedic Medicine; Deborah gently embraced then fully incorporated the foundational principles of Ayurveda into her private practice.

Fat melted off her clients- hormones rebalanced, menopausal women found their husbands cute once again- sleep cycles vastly improved-brains re calibrated-energy skyrocketed-moods stabilized- while toilets across the metro area were getting a workout!  Best of all adult onset diabetic clients dropped blood sugar levels by 30 to 50 points  weekly ---while high Insulin levels (HgA1C) dropped consistently over 2 to 6 months.

A better way to help, guide and serve clients became a honed science!


Albert R.  on March 30, 2014

Diagnosed by his physicians with: High blood pressure,  Adult onset Diabetes, Obesity, Kidney Problems, Chronic Fatigue

Albert R.  on June 28, 2014

Blood Pressure dropped         from 198/66  to 145/42
Blood Sugar                                from 250 to 114
HgA1C                                           from 6.7 to 5.8
Body fat                                       dropped -22 pounds
Energy (scale of 1 thru 10)     was a 2, is now an 8
with 10 being high
Lean Mass                                   up 12 pounds

How The Plan-it Lean technology works:

Plan-it Lean's smart lifeline technology gives the user a simple easy to use software program that delivers directives such as what to eat today provided by daily food “maps” along with lifestyle recommendations (sleep cycle adjustments, additional workout protocols) based on the subscribers current food preferences, plus workout or," no workout today" choices. 

For example should the consumer "enter" consumption of alcohol or pizza into their program they will receive either a different calculation regarding total calories needed that day PLUS adjustments regarding the percentages derived from Proteins, Healthy Fats or low glycemic  Carbohydrates OR perhaps a  recommendation to increase minutes of cardio burn to level the Blast Fat playing field.

The goal is to educate and direct the user on how NOT to increase body fat...(should they desire to have their cake and eat it too) or ideally, how to "blast" current fat stores fast!

The  1000's of algorithms embedded in the Lifeline technology delivers a program rich in its capabilities while offering an extraordinary number of personalized variables and options to the subscriber daily..

Goal dates set by the subscriber will be tracked by the Lifeline technology.  Options/reminders to alter goal dates based on performance by the subscriber will pop up daily within the users program.

Subscriber's goals can vary: from blasting belly fat and losing weight, to reversing high glucose levels, lowering HgA1C, increasing energy, sleeping better or saying goodbye to bloat, gas and constipation.

This information Lifeline technology software is delivered in the form of a subscription program which charts the user’s progress based on the input of 6 simple queries.

Technology tracking data includes:

 1.  Subscriber’s current weight

 2.  Approx current body fat percentage

 3.  Minutes of cardio burn per week

 4.  The user’s ideal weight

 5.  Ideal body fat percentage plus  

 6.  Target goal date.

The Plan-it Lean smart software program in turn calculates the users total pounds of body fat to lean mass ratios.

This allows the user to adjust the numerous algorithms within the program to create new preferred food “map” options based on variances in daily altered lifestyle choices.

Total minimum caloric requirements are based on the users lifestyle decisions. For example  (to exercise or not exercise). Food “map” downloads specify percentages, calories, grams plus units the user needs to consume from Proteins, Fats and low glycemic Carbs all driven by the Plan-it Lean revolutionary technology.

Weekly updates delivered to the user will track current weight and body fat percentage, total pounds of fat loss, pounds of increased lean mass,  as well as the number of days or weeks it will take to reach their ultimate goal based on their weekly progress.

Once daily food “maps” are downloaded by the subscriber the Plan-it Lean program will chart progress or lack thereof. The intelligent Lifeline action of the technology presents alternatives and adjustments to Lifestyle choices and variations such as exercise or not, the user’s total hours of sleep per night, the inclusion of alcohol or say, the desire for a “treat” such as pizza or a brownie.

Animation: Our educational "edutainment" component

The Plan-it Lean Lifeline technology is not only intelligent it also delivers subliminal education via the insertion of engaging animated "pop up" characters.

The Heart Smart Kids and The Junk Food Junkie characters “pop up” daily as reminders for the user to track personal progress and further utilize their program.  Through “edutainment” (education co- combined with animated entertainment) these educational characters deliver health information tidbits which “serve” to inform, grow and expand the subscriber’s knowledge base.


This feature adds to positive outcome potential for the user by engaging and entertaining while reminding the user daily to keep their eye on the prize which is their ultimate goal!  We support subscribers’ successes by cheerleading ----thru edutainment.

With obesity and diabetes growing at an alarming rate  worldwide we need to throw ourselves AND our children a Lifeline!  Statistics reveal that over the last decade the rate of Childhood Type 2 ( adult onset) diabetes has grown by 29%.  This means 1 out every 16 kids under the age of 20 is tumbling towards ”add on” health problems down the road with obesity at the forefront. Our kids are clueless, unknowingly embracing future disease states that can be avoided through education and sensible food choices!

Here are the Facts:

-Childhood Type 1 diabetes is up 70% from 1985 to 2004 and growing strong.

-One out of three kids will develop Type 2 diabetes in their lifetime!

-From 2005 to 2030 statisticians predict that diabetes will advance from 1.3 billion people engulfing the lives of 2.0 billion people!

-In America obesity rates are moving like a Tsunami.  From 2008 to 2013 obesity rates have risen from 25.5% to 27.2% of the population.

-Yet again, statistics show a 72% increase in diabetic trends word wide from 2010 to 2030!


It’s time to throw yourself, our children and the rest of our planet a Lifeline!

Plan it Lean’s “Throw Yourself a Lifeline” intuitive and intelligent technology is designed to be launched as an online subscription program or a downloadable app. 

Our tech team in Kerala India, ThoughtLine Tech  is renowned for creating algorithm heavy technologies for companies worldwide.

Since 2008, ThoughtLine has provided niche, custom solutions to Fortune 500 companies with predictable, consistent service, day in and day out. Moving beyond the usual client-vendor relationship, ThoughtLine functions almost as an extension of the client. Their dedicated team of IT professionals, functioning from their state of the art facilities, provide world class service to their clients, taking care of their client's information technology needs - thus letting them do what they do best.

The algorithm based software program aims to do far more than just calculate and deliver food “maps” to the end user.  The Plan-it Lean platform is revolutionary as well as unique to each user.  End game? Blasting body fat, reversing adult onset diabetes and bolstering energy! These are just a few of the long term benefits. We are creating the consumer’s online personal nutritionist, accessible daily!

HOW MUCH WILL THE PLAN-IT LEAN LIFELINE SUBSCRIPTION COST?

This $287.00 six week subscription program is not only your LIFELINE it is very intelligent! Computations and algorithms’ can vary daily Personalized for each user:  in that individuals tend to be either creative and variant or habitual in their food choices as well as lifestyle habits.

Formulated goals will track losses and gains with animated character “pop ups” delivering witty edutainment based educational tidbits as to how the user lost or gained fat or lean muscle mass!

If the subscriber is missing in action and has not logged in for more than 2 days the programs’ animated characters will automatically pop up on the screen-inquiring/cheerleading/ guiding the user back onto their path towards their personal preset goals.

Potential for Plan-it Lean , our NEXT STEPS:

Within the upcoming year Arneson and her team of 5 aims to develop add on features to Plan-it Lean that assess/analyze, hence further triage and “fix” specific health concerns. Assessments will take into consideration nutritional deficits based on blood, hair mineral and hormone test results delivering to the end user recommended nutrient specific “re- balancing” protocols.

Inflammatory based diseases such as Arthritis, Rheumatoid, Eczema, or Irritable Bowel Syndrome can be addressed and resolved based on the infusion of specific targeted nutrients along with a personalized algorithm based dietary protocol to further reduce gut as well as other inflammatory conditions!

This “program with a brain” tweaks lifestyle habits moving the subscriber towards ultimate healthy goals with education as an option.  Lowering cholesterol and blood sugar levels is easy- while moving an individual away from “emotional” eating can be more complicated.

Nonetheless- studies show if satiety centers in the brain are satisfied biochemically-emotional triggers have less affect on the brain.

The beauty of Plan-it Lean’s Throw Yourself a Lifeline technology- comes with built in privacy. The adventure of altering ones health outcome can be done in the privacy and convenience of one’s home. Rather than paying upwards of $100 an hour for nutrition consulting and therapy, paying for parking, sitting in a waiting room,  consumers can wade through Plan-it Lean’s “free” site which rolled out 6 months ago.

Plan-it Lean’s user friendly site hosts a cornucopia of information designed at expanding the consumer’s health knowledge!  As consumers gather knowledge- choices become education based and “knowing” rather than reactive or convenience based.

Our Plan-it Lean education site currently offers 5 quizzes (at no charge) providing consumers with assessments and guidance plus explanations on what to incorporate/change in transition towards one’s ideal health scenario!

Free to the consumer quizzes include:

-A Basic health review which queries water intake, sleep habits, bowel movements, energy levels etc.

-The Stress Quiz assesses the consumer’s perceived stress levels with guidance on how to lower stress levels.

Deborah’s favorite and most useful tool is:

-The Adrenal fatigue questionnaire.  Responses indicate precisely how exhausted the user’s adrenal glands and endocrine system is at this point in time.  Giving the consumer answers/guidance to further explore the appropriate steps required to “fix” their adrenals which are the backbone of the immune system.

-A Mineral Deficiency questionnaire targets mineral/vitamin deficiencies which do a collective “dance” in the activation of metabolism.

-The Ayurvedic Assessment “What’s your Dosha?” is for the more enlightened consumer who is interested in this 5000 year old modality of healing with the understanding of their two primary “energies” or Doshas. Each of the 3 major doshas has “gifts” as well as potential health pitfalls. Knowing one’s primary and secondary Dosha reveals foods, herb’s and  flavors to incorporate daily; as well as foods to avoid to keep oneself in ideal Doshic  balance hence- disease free!

The good news for Arneson is she’s diving into a hot market segment with over $60 Billion being spent out of pocket by consumers seeking affordable online answers to weight loss alone.

 Meanwhile $34 Billion is being spent for alternative based protocols including nutrition supplementation.

The American Diabetes Association and the American Dietician Associations are befuddled and clueless as how to guide consumers in preventing, braking and reversing the crazy rise of obesity and diabetes in the U.S.

Clearly diets DO NOT work- with studies finding consumers packing on the fat faster than ever before in the history of mankind!

The entire U.S, and planet is ripe for a “map” on how to blast fat, bolster energy, reverse diabetic trends, activate their toilets, get rid of gas, bloat and Gurd, balance moods and hormones and lower cholesterol without drugs.  Most importantly?  Lessen visits to the Doctor AND save money!

Funding Requirements

Our Costs:

Plan it Lean’s funding requirements are $ 69,200.00

A total of $54,000.00 is required to develop the Lifeline technology. Thousands of algorithms will calculate 100’s of  food "map" alternatives along with providing the subscriber with a myriad of flexible options.

A portion of the $54,000 will go into creating our Plan-it Lean's "beyond extensive"  1000's upon 1000's of food options needed to create the Plan-it Lean data base. Currently there are no data bases available for purchase that can provide us with every conceivable food on the planet!

Our programers must then convert each and every food on the planet into our patented "UNITS" which breaks down and delivers total calories, grams, and percentages required from each food group to the subscriber.

Incorporating every conceivable food  from around the world will revolutionize our "intelligent" technology!

The balance of $15,200 is required for the creation of our animated characters which will be infused as "pop up" educators in Plan-it Lean "Throw Yourself a Lifeline" technology. 

A total of 7 Heart Smart Kid animated characters plus 4 Junk Food Junkie characters are already drawn, designed and patented.

The animated educational characters reflect “cool” foods such as “Broc”. For example Broc represents a reminder to eat those veggies- increase fiber intake-experience amazing bowel movements! Ultimately Blast Fat!

The Junk Food Junkies represent “faux” foods that are taking our health down the drain.

These “Fast” junk food characters range from “Big Daddy” junk  to “Sneaks” a wired sugar cube to Tie Die- A seductive canned soda to Zombie, our mucus loaded greasy French fry!

 The animated character reminders are online healthy “teachers.” Termed “edutainment” these animated characters are infused into our Lifelinetechnolgy to educate, humor and encourage users to stay directed.

The Heart Smart Kids and Junk Food Junkies will entertain and engage. Using the consumer driven “edutainment” approach appeals to the “Big Kid” in all consumers! Teaching without preaching!

Our group in India will develop the intuitive technology based program for 168 food “map” variations. Each “map” has the capability of recalibrating the original map based on input data from the user. Optional “maps” provide up to 10 alternative templates based on the users Lifestyle choices for the day or week ahead.  

Percentages, grams, portions, total calories, along with ideal food lists presented in in the form of "maps" range from 600 calories (for children) up to 4800 calories (for body builders).

168 individual unique to the user downloadable “food maps” offer up to 10 variations per map depending on the following data input by the user:

1. Current weight

2. Weight goal

3. Minutes of cardio burn per week

4. Current body fat percentage

5. Ideal body fat percentage

6. Goal date

This intelligent intuitive technology platform delivers the subscriber a personalized unique to them food “map” incorporating a suggested (feeding) schedule. Further defined by  grams, portion sizes, ounces as well as allotted percentages from Proteins, Healthy Fats  and low glycemic Carbohydrates delivers the total MINIMUM  number of calories the user requires daily. Percentages are the key to the success of the program determined by lifestyle variations such as hours of sleep per night.

Deborah's clients refer to her Plan-it Lean program as cracking their DNA code- ultimately jump starting metabolism!  Coming from both a science and art background- the perfect union is finally here- science, education and entertainment. The ideal way to keep consumers engaged.

28 years ago Deborah's first mission statement was: To change the way the world thinks--- therefore change the way the world works.

She pulled it off the wall 7 years ago. She put it back on her wall 2 years ago!

Truly helping people-

Changing our medical paradigm for the better

Saving people precious hard to come by dollars

Giving people back their lust for living

Leaving the planet a better place.

This is what Plan-it Lean will bring to the “table” the "key" for millions of consumers seeking an awesome journey, a healthier life!

Join us ......Throw Yourself a Lifeline!

                                                                        Then our kids…….

                                                                                                          Then our Planet………

Thank you in advance for supporting our campaign!


About us

Deborah Arneson is a Licensed Clinical Nutritionist with degrees in Food Science & Biochemistry, having worked in the nutrition/education/consulting/counseling field for over 25 years. Her main areas of expertise are Hormone Assessment and balancing/Menopause, Blasting Fat/Building Lean muscle mass for her clients, Reversing Adult onset Diabetes, Stomping out Insulin Resistance, Increasing Energy, while defeating gas, bloat, constipation and diahhrea! Her heart's desire continues to be "Changing the way the world works by helping people find their way through the  crazy health maze".  

Emeline Harris grew up in Paris, France. She has lived in London, Illinois, California, Missouri and Texas. She served in the Army for a year. She is a mother of 2 with one on the way. She is very creative and wants to use all her talents towards becoming a chef. Until her dream goal can be achieved, she will rock as a receptionist, administrative assistant, and Plan-it Lean's social media guru. Emeline's heart's desire for now is to provide for her family and be the best mother she can be to her children.

Remington Arneson is currently a Computer Science major at University of Florida. Remington graduated Stranahan High School from the Engineering Magnet Program.  He participated in Business Professionals of America (BPA) winning awards in categories of Computer Security and Financial Math at the state level. Remington was co-captain of the swim team and participated Robotics Team.  He currently enjoys snowboarding, and anything to do with computers!

Matthew Russell is experienced with social media marketing and promotion and is a lifelong technology enthusiast.  He is Plan-it Lean's sage advisor!


WOULD YOU LIKE TO JOIN US? 

We've come so very far since our project was just a dream!  Its been an amazing journey but also a tremendous amount of work for people with more than full time jobs and college curriculum's! on top of everyone's packed full time lives!It is now time for us to hire our team in India to help us move into production.Once our technology is produced we will need to tweek our intelligent/intuitive software- making it as simple and easy to use as possible for you, our consummate consumer!  We will then require a number of Beta testers to dive in and test drive our Plan-it Lean software program.
We hope to have the technology completed within 4 to 5 months, hopefully by January 2015. We are blessed to have a cornucopia of potential subscribers, even before our product is ready.  Many of Deborah s' clients (some for decades) are, and have been "chomping at the bit" to have access 24/7 to Plan-it Lean's technology, giving them their own personalized online nutritionist always at the ready day or night!
 If you LOVE our concept, but aren't able to contribute financially--No Worries!  There are some other terrific ways to help out.  We are pretty certain that only a small percentage of the Planet knows about  Plan-it Lean's how to "Throw yourself a Lifeline" at this point in time.  Therefore we GREATLY appreciate your telling others about Plan-it Lean...be it by talking, tweeting, Face Booking, or just plain "liking us"!

PARADIGM SHIFT

The implementation of Plan-it LEAN across the globe would change peoples health for the far better on so many levels! 

 Plan-It Leans' technology creates a personalized "map" encompassing lifestyle "shifts" guiding people towards the "how to" gently create positive changes --bearing enormous health benefits.

Current statistics denoting health/disease trends are almost incomprehensible along with just plain scary!

Throughout history the grass roots efforts of "the people", people just like you and me have created the most momentous of changes, Fueling "outdated old " paradigms towards their long overdue end --while igniting the "ideal" paradigm-- to take a strong hold----for the betterment of many!

Quid pro quo  is an outdated standard. At this point in the history of mankind the sabre tooth tiger are "Lifestyle" induced diseases with obesity and diabetes leading the way! Knowledge is key to survival of our species for those of us who wish to pass on our gene pool.

Statistics reveal by the year 2030 seventy percent of the world's population will be pre diabetic, diabetic as well as tap dancing with obesity !

The old adage "you have nothing if you don't have your health" is in our face more than ever....Without energy, vitality and a desire to move, produce, dance or just walk your dog...the 'envelope" of one's life shrinks, everything else loses its luster...and so it goes....

The clock is ticking...ticking loudly! Cancer is targeting 1 out of 3 people across our Planet. Adult onset Diabetes is encroaching upon the lives of 1 out of 4 adults, the shocker? 1 out of 16 of our kids, with Obesity in fast pursuit!

The Plan-it Lean intelligent and intuitive technology will change peoples lives, give people back their health, put the brakes on diabetes and obesity, maybe even give people the desire to walk, jump, dance or get just out of bed! All are symptoms of "good" health supported by educated choices!

At some point in time we have all been or will be touched by someone we care about experiencing a disease.

Stress ramps up for each and every person involved in another's disease process-- Stress leads to high cortisol which packs on the belly fat which leads to insulin resistance....any disease is debilitating for all concerned.

 Plan-it Lean brings to everyone's table the answer in the form of education or, just good old fashioned practical guidance delivering the end user a personalized MAP!

We all  know this: to create change; knowledge or guidance is foundational, even more importantly "it" needs to be  simple and affordable. The "it" is Plan-it Lean!

The Plan-it Lean technology will give people everywhere the opportunity to change their health outcome towards the better.  Presenting an abundance of possibilities--

Personalized, unique and revolutionary......

PLAN-IT LEAN IS THROWING YOURSELF A LIFELINE!  

More About Us

It's been a sometimes challenging yet MOST interesting and expansive learning curve as well as journey!  We started working on Plan-it LEAN in 2010.

We thank you each and every one of you for helping us to take our tried and true formulas/concept to a reality that has the ability to change our entire health paradigm to one of "oh so much better" for people all over our Planet!

Nameste,  Deborah
