Albert R.  on March 30, 2014Diagnosed by his physicians with: High blood pressure,  Adult onset Diabetes, Obesity, Kidney Problems, Chronic Fatigue Albert R.  on June 28, 2014Blood Pressure dropped         from 198/66  to 145/42Blood Sugar                                from 250 to 114HgA1C                                           from 6.7 to 5.8Body fat                                       dropped -22 poundsEnergy (scale of 1 thru 10)     was a 2, is now an 8with 10 being highLean Mass                                   up 12 pounds

How The Plan-it Lean technology works:
Plan-it Lean's smart lifeline technology gives the user a simple easy to use software program that delivers directives such as what to eat today provided by daily food “maps” along with lifestyle recommendations (sleep cycle adjustments, additional workout protocols) based on the subscribers current food preferences, plus workout or," no workout today" choices.  
For example should the consumer "enter" consumption of alcohol or pizza into their program they will receive either a different calculation regarding total calories needed that day PLUS adjustments regarding the percentages derived from Proteins, Healthy Fats or low glycemic  Carbohydrates OR perhaps a  recommendation to increase minutes of cardio burn to level the Blast Fat playing field.
 The goal is to educate and direct the user on how NOT to increase body fat...(should they desire to have their cake and eat it too) or ideally, how to "blast" current fat stores fast!
 The  1000's of algorithms embedded in the Lifeline technology delivers a program rich in its capabilities while offering an extraordinary number of personalized variables and options to the subscriber daily.. 
Goal dates set by the subscriber will be tracked by the Lifeline technology.  Options/reminders to alter goal dates based on performance by the subscriber will pop up daily within the users program.
Subscriber's goals can vary: from blasting belly fat and losing weight, to reversing high glucose levels, lowering HgA1C, increasing energy, sleeping better or saying goodbye to bloat, gas and constipation.
This information Lifeline technology software is delivered in the form of a subscription program which charts the user’s progress based on the input of 6 simple queries.

Technology tracking data includes:
 1.  Subscriber’s current weight
 2.  Approx current body fat percentage
 3.  Minutes of cardio burn per week
 4.  The user’s ideal weight
 5.  Ideal body fat percentage plus  
 6.  Target goal date.
The Plan-it Lean smart software program in turn calculates the users total pounds of body fat to lean mass ratios.
This allows the user to adjust the numerous algorithms within the program to create new preferred food “map” options based on variances in daily altered lifestyle choices.
Total minimum caloric requirements are based on the users lifestyle decisions. For example  (to exercise or not exercise). Food “map” downloads specify percentages, calories, grams plus units the user needs to consume from Proteins, Fats and low glycemic Carbs all driven by the Plan-it Lean revolutionary technology.
Weekly updates delivered to the user will track current weight and body fat percentage, total pounds of fat loss, pounds of increased lean mass,  as well as the number of days or weeks it will take to reach their ultimate goal based on their weekly progress.

Once daily food “maps” are downloaded by the subscriber the Plan-it Lean program will chart progress or lack thereof. The intelligent Lifeline action of the technology presents alternatives and adjustments to Lifestyle choices and variations such as exercise or not, the user’s total hours of sleep per night, the inclusion of alcohol or say, the desire for a “treat” such as pizza or a brownie.
Animation: Our educational "edutainment" component
The Plan-it Lean Lifeline technology is not only intelligent it also delivers subliminal education via the insertion of engaging animated "pop up" characters.


The Heart Smart Kids and The Junk Food Junkie characters “pop up” daily as reminders for the user to track personal progress and further utilize their program.  Through “edutainment” (education co- combined with animated entertainment) these educational characters deliver health information tidbits which “serve” to inform, grow and expand the subscriber’s knowledge base.


This feature adds to positive outcome potential for the user by engaging and entertaining while reminding the user daily to keep their eye on the prize which is their ultimate goal!  We support subscribers’ successes by cheerleading ----thru edutainment.

With obesity and diabetes growing at an alarming rate  worldwide we need to throw ourselves AND our children a Lifeline!  Statistics reveal that over the last decade the rate of Childhood Type 2 ( adult onset) diabetes has grown by 29%.  This means 1 out every 16 kids under the age of 20 is tumbling towards ”add on” health problems down the road with obesity at the forefront. Our kids are clueless, unknowingly embracing future disease states that can be avoided through education and sensible food choices!
Here are the Facts:
-Childhood Type 1 diabetes is up 70% from 1985 to 2004 and growing strong.
-One out of three kids will develop Type 2 diabetes in their lifetime!
-From 2005 to 2030 statisticians predict that diabetes will advance from 1.3 billion people engulfing the lives of 2.0 billion people!
-In America obesity rates are moving like a Tsunami.  From 2008 to 2013 obesity rates have risen from 25.5% to 27.2% of the population.
-Yet again, statistics show a 72% increase in diabetic trends word wide from 2010 to 2030!

It’s time to throw yourself, our children and the rest of our planet a Lifeline!
Plan it Lean’s “Throw Yourself a Lifeline” intuitive and intelligent technology is designed to be launched as an online subscription program or a downloadable app. 
Our tech team in Kerala India, ThoughtLine Tech  is renowned for creating algorithm heavy technologies for companies worldwide.




Since 2008, ThoughtLine has provided niche, custom solutions to Fortune 500 companies with predictable, consistent service, day in and day out. Moving beyond the usual client-vendor relationship, ThoughtLine functions almost as an extension of the client. Their dedicated team of IT professionals, functioning from their state of the art facilities, provide world class service to their clients, taking care of their client's information technology needs - thus letting them do what they do best.

The algorithm based software program aims to do far more than just calculate and deliver food “maps” to the end user.  The Plan-it Lean platform is revolutionary as well as unique to each user.  End game? Blasting body fat, reversing adult onset diabetes and bolstering energy! These are just a few of the long term benefits. We are creating the consumer’s online personal nutritionist, accessible daily!
HOW MUCH WILL THE PLAN-IT LEAN LIFELINE SUBSCRIPTION COST?
This $287.00 six week subscription program is not only your LIFELINE it is very intelligent! Computations and algorithms’ can vary daily Personalized for each user:  in that individuals tend to be either creative and variant or habitual in their food choices as well as lifestyle habits.
Formulated goals will track losses and gains with animated character “pop ups” delivering witty edutainment based educational tidbits as to how the user lost or gained fat or lean muscle mass!
If the subscriber is missing in action and has not logged in for more than 2 days the programs’ animated characters will automatically pop up on the screen-inquiring/cheerleading/ guiding the user back onto their path towards their personal preset goals.
Potential for Plan-it Lean , our NEXT STEPS:
Within the upcoming year Arneson and her team of 5 aims to develop add on features to Plan-it Lean that assess/analyze, hence further triage and “fix” specific health concerns. Assessments will take into consideration nutritional deficits based on blood, hair mineral and hormone test results delivering to the end user recommended nutrient specific “re- balancing” protocols.
Inflammatory based diseases such as Arthritis, Rheumatoid, Eczema, or Irritable Bowel Syndrome can be addressed and resolved based on the infusion of specific targeted nutrients along with a personalized algorithm based dietary protocol to further reduce gut as well as other inflammatory conditions!
This “program with a brain” tweaks lifestyle habits moving the subscriber towards ultimate healthy goals with education as an option.  Lowering cholesterol and blood sugar levels is easy- while moving an individual away from “emotional” eating can be more complicated.
Nonetheless- studies show if satiety centers in the brain are satisfied biochemically-emotional triggers have less affect on the brain.
The beauty of Plan-it Lean’s Throw Yourself a Lifeline technology- comes with built in privacy. The adventure of altering ones health outcome can be done in the privacy and convenience of one’s home. Rather than paying upwards of $100 an hour for nutrition consulting and therapy, paying for parking, sitting in a waiting room,  consumers can wade through Plan-it Lean’s “free” site which rolled out 6 months ago.
Plan-it Lean’s user friendly site hosts a cornucopia of information designed at expanding the consumer’s health knowledge!  As consumers gather knowledge- choices become education based and “knowing” rather than reactive or convenience based.
Our Plan-it Lean education site currently offers 5 quizzes (at no charge) providing consumers with assessments and guidance plus explanations on what to incorporate/change in transition towards one’s ideal health scenario!
Free to the consumer quizzes include:
-A Basic health review which queries water intake, sleep habits, bowel movements, energy levels etc.
-The Stress Quiz assesses the consumer’s perceived stress levels with guidance on how to lower stress levels.
Deborah’s favorite and most useful tool is:
-The Adrenal fatigue questionnaire.  Responses indicate precisely how exhausted the user’s adrenal glands and endocrine system is at this point in time.  Giving the consumer answers/guidance to further explore the appropriate steps required to “fix” their adrenals which are the backbone of the immune system.
-A Mineral Deficiency questionnaire targets mineral/vitamin deficiencies which do a collective “dance” in the activation of metabolism.
-The Ayurvedic Assessment “What’s your Dosha?” is for the more enlightened consumer who is interested in this 5000 year old modality of healing with the understanding of their two primary “energies” or Doshas. Each of the 3 major doshas has “gifts” as well as potential health pitfalls. Knowing one’s primary and secondary Dosha reveals foods, herb’s and  flavors to incorporate daily; as well as foods to avoid to keep oneself in ideal Doshic  balance hence- disease free!
The good news for Arneson is she’s diving into a hot market segment with over $60 Billion being spent out of pocket by consumers seeking affordable online answers to weight loss alone.
 Meanwhile $34 Billion is being spent for alternative based protocols including nutrition supplementation.
The American Diabetes Association and the American Dietician Associations are befuddled and clueless as how to guide consumers in preventing, braking and reversing the crazy rise of obesity and diabetes in the U.S.
Clearly diets DO NOT work- with studies finding consumers packing on the fat faster than ever before in the history of mankind!
The entire U.S, and planet is ripe for a “map” on how to blast fat, bolster energy, reverse diabetic trends, activate their toilets, get rid of gas, bloat and Gurd, balance moods and hormones and lower cholesterol without drugs.  Most importantly?  Lessen visits to the Doctor AND save money!
Funding Requirements
Our Costs:
Plan it Lean’s funding requirements are $ 69,200.00
A total of $54,000.00 is required to develop the Lifeline technology. Thousands of algorithms will calculate 100’s of  food "map" alternatives along with providing the subscriber with a myriad of flexible options. 
A portion of the $54,000 will go into creating our Plan-it Lean's "beyond extensive"  1000's upon 1000's of food options needed to create the Plan-it Lean data base. Currently there are no data bases available for purchase that can provide us with every conceivable food on the planet!
Our programers must then convert each and every food on the planet into our patented "UNITS" which breaks down and delivers total calories, grams, and percentages required from each food group to the subscriber.
 Incorporating every conceivable food  from around the world will revolutionize our "intelligent" technology!
The balance of $15,200 is required for the creation of our animated characters which will be infused as "pop up" educators in Plan-it Lean "Throw Yourself a Lifeline" technology.  
A total of 7 Heart Smart Kid animated characters plus 4 Junk Food Junkie characters are already drawn, designed and patented.
The animated educational characters reflect “cool” foods such as “Broc”. For example Broc represents a reminder to eat those veggies- increase fiber intake-experience amazing bowel movements! Ultimately Blast Fat!
The Junk Food Junkies represent “faux” foods that are taking our health down the drain.
These “Fast” junk food characters range from “Big Daddy” junk  to “Sneaks” a wired sugar cube to Tie Die- A seductive canned soda to Zombie, our mucus loaded greasy French fry!
 The animated character reminders are online healthy “teachers.” Termed “edutainment” these animated characters are infused into our Lifelinetechnolgy to educate, humor and encourage users to stay directed.
The Heart Smart Kids and Junk Food Junkies will entertain and engage. Using the consumer driven “edutainment” approach appeals to the “Big Kid” in all consumers! Teaching without preaching!
Our group in India will develop the intuitive technology based program for 168 food “map” variations. Each “map” has the capability of recalibrating the original map based on input data from the user. Optional “maps” provide up to 10 alternative templates based on the users Lifestyle choices for the day or week ahead.  
Percentages, grams, portions, total calories, along with ideal food lists presented in in the form of "maps" range from 600 calories (for children) up to 4800 calories (for body builders).
168 individual unique to the user downloadable “food maps” offer up to 10 variations per map depending on the following data input by the user:
1. Current weight
2. Weight goal
3. Minutes of cardio burn per week
4. Current body fat percentage
5. Ideal body fat percentage
6. Goal date
This intelligent intuitive technology platform delivers the subscriber a personalized unique to them food “map” incorporating a suggested (feeding) schedule. Further defined by  grams, portion sizes, ounces as well as allotted percentages from Proteins, Healthy Fats  and low glycemic Carbohydrates delivers the total MINIMUM  number of calories the user requires daily. Percentages are the key to the success of the program determined by lifestyle variations such as hours of sleep per night.
Deborah's clients refer to her Plan-it Lean program as cracking their DNA code- ultimately jump starting metabolism!  Coming from both a science and art background- the perfect union is finally here- science, education and entertainment. The ideal way to keep consumers engaged.
28 years ago Deborah's first mission statement was: To change the way the world thinks--- therefore change the way the world works.
She pulled it off the wall 7 years ago. She put it back on her wall 2 years ago!
Truly helping people-
Changing our medical paradigm for the better
Saving people precious hard to come by dollars
Giving people back their lust for living
Leaving the planet a better place.
This is what Plan-it Lean will bring to the “table” the "key" for millions of consumers seeking an awesome journey, a healthier life!
Join us ......Throw Yourself a Lifeline!
                                                                        Then our kids…….
                                                                                                          Then our Planet………
Thank you in advance for supporting our campaign!

About us


Deborah Arneson is a Licensed Clinical Nutritionist with degrees in Food Science & Biochemistry, having worked in the nutrition/education/consulting/counseling field for over 25 years. Her main areas of expertise are Hormone Assessment and balancing/Menopause, Blasting Fat/Building Lean muscle mass for her clients, Reversing Adult onset Diabetes, Stomping out Insulin Resistance, Increasing Energy, while defeating gas, bloat, constipation and diahhrea! Her heart's desire continues to be "Changing the way the world works by helping people find their way through the  crazy health maze".  

Emeline Harris grew up in Paris, France. She has lived in London, Illinois,
California, Missouri and Texas. She served in the Army for a year. She is a mother
of 2 with one on the way. She is very creative and wants to use all her talents towards
becoming a chef. Until her dream goal can be achieved, she will rock as a receptionist, administrative assistant, and Plan-it Lean's social media guru. Emeline's heart's desire for now is to provide for her family and be the best
mother she can be to her children.

Remington Arneson is currently a Computer Science major at
University of Florida. Remington graduated Stranahan High School from the
Engineering Magnet Program.  He
participated in Business Professionals of America (BPA) winning awards in
categories of Computer Security and Financial Math at the state level. Remington was co-captain of the swim team and participated Robotics
Team.  He currently enjoys snowboarding,
and anything to do with computers!

Matthew Russell is experienced with social media marketing and promotion and is a lifelong technology enthusiast.  He is Plan-it Lean's sage advisor! 




WOULD YOU LIKE TO JOIN US? 
We've come so very far since our project was just a dream!  Its been an amazing journey but also a tremendous amount of work for people with more than full time jobs and college curriculum's! on top of everyone's packed full time lives!It is now time for us to hire our team in India to help us move into production.Once our technology is produced we will need to tweek our intelligent/intuitive software- making it as simple and easy to use as possible for you, our consummate consumer!  We will then require a number of Beta testers to dive in and test drive our Plan-it Lean software program.We hope to have the technology completed within 4 to 5 months, hopefully by January 2015. We are blessed to have a cornucopia of potential subscribers, even before our product is ready.  Many of Deborah s' clients (some for decades) are, and have been "chomping at the bit" to have access 24/7 to Plan-it Lean's technology, giving them their own personalized online nutritionist always at the ready day or night! If you LOVE our concept, but aren't able to contribute financially--No Worries!  There are some other terrific ways to help out.  We are pretty certain that only a small percentage of the Planet knows about  Plan-it Lean's how to "Throw yourself a Lifeline" at this point in time.  Therefore we GREATLY appreciate your telling others about Plan-it Lean...be it by talking, tweeting, Face Booking, or just plain "liking us"!


PARADIGM SHIFT
The implementation of Plan-it LEAN across the globe would change peoples health for the far better on so many levels! 
 Plan-It Leans' technology creates a personalized "map" encompassing lifestyle "shifts" guiding people towards the "how to" gently create positive changes --bearing enormous health benefits.
Current statistics denoting health/disease trends are almost incomprehensible along with just plain scary!
Throughout history the grass roots efforts of "the people", people just like you and me have created the most momentous of changes, Fueling "outdated old " paradigms towards their long overdue end --while igniting the "ideal" paradigm-- to take a strong hold----for the betterment of many!
Quid pro quo  is an outdated standard. At this point in the history of mankind the sabre tooth tiger are "Lifestyle" induced diseases with obesity and diabetes leading the way! Knowledge is key to survival of our species for those of us who wish to pass on our gene pool.
Statistics reveal by the year 2030 seventy percent of the world's population will be pre diabetic, diabetic as well as tap dancing with obesity !
The old adage "you have nothing if you don't have your health" is in our face more than ever....Without energy, vitality and a desire to move, produce, dance or just walk your dog...the 'envelope" of one's life shrinks, everything else loses its luster...and so it goes....
The clock is ticking...ticking loudly! Cancer is targeting 1 out of 3 people across our Planet. Adult onset Diabetes is encroaching upon the lives of 1 out of 4 adults, the shocker? 1 out of 16 of our kids, with Obesity in fast pursuit!
The Plan-it Lean intelligent and intuitive technology will change peoples lives, give people back their health, put the brakes on diabetes and obesity, maybe even give people the desire to walk, jump, dance or get just out of bed! All are symptoms of "good" health supported by educated choices!
At some point in time we have all been or will be touched by someone we care about experiencing a disease.
Stress ramps up for each and every person involved in another's disease process-- Stress leads to high cortisol which packs on the belly fat which leads to insulin resistance....any disease is debilitating for all concerned.
 Plan-it Lean brings to everyone's table the answer in the form of education or, just good old fashioned practical guidance delivering the end user a personalized MAP!
We all  know this: to create change; knowledge or guidance is foundational, even more importantly "it" needs to be  simple and affordable. The "it" is Plan-it Lean!

The Plan-it Lean technology will give people everywhere the opportunity to change their health outcome towards the better.  Presenting an abundance of possibilities--
Personalized, unique and revolutionary......
 PLAN-IT LEAN IS THROWING YOURSELF A LIFELINE!  
More About Us
It's been a sometimes challenging yet MOST interesting and expansive learning curve as well as journey!  We started working on Plan-it LEAN in 2010.
We thank you each and every one of you for helping us to take our tried and true formulas/concept to a reality that has the ability to change our entire health paradigm to one of "oh so much better" for people all over our Planet!
Nameste,  Deborah

story:
What does My Baby Size offers?
Based on a 15 years research, My Baby Size offers to any mother the most precise tool for estimating a baby birth weight & length. The tool provides estimations 3 months in advance than today's commonly used method (starting at 5 months). My Baby Size also revolutionizes the pregnancy care follow-up for small and big babies by delivering much more precise estimation. My Baby Size improves the pregnancy care model. This innovation can save lives. Help us now.

Why does My Baby Size need your help for ?
By supporting our action you are part of our pregnancy care improvement community. We need your help to develop My Baby Size's App for smartphones and tablets. Our aim is also propose the App for free to download, enabling everyone to get the service 24x7x365.

How can you be helpful?
By supporting our charity plan and spreading up the information all around your network. The more funds we get, the more we can communicate and expand the service all over the world in several languages as Spanish, Portuguese, German, Italian ... .

SUPPORT OUR PROJECT: PLEASE BUY OUR EXCLUSIVE ACCESSORIES.

What are the benefits for the babies ?
Mothers are still facing many risks during pregnancy, especially for small and big babies. My Baby Size helps both mothers and doctors to reduce these risks.


What are the 6 main benefits of My Baby Size?
- Availability 3 months earlier than today
- Provide much more precise estimation than today
- Extend prediction fields to the size of the baby
- Helping to save lives threatened by a high-risk pregnancy
- Reduce the number of scans (low & large foetuses)

What are the performances of My Baby Size?
Check out My Baby Size’s performances on birth weight and size predictions. My Baby Size provides the earliest birth weight/size predictions during pregnancy, combined with the highest accuracy rate ever. 

SUPPORT OUR PROJECT: PLEASE BUY OUR EXCLUSIVE MAN SHIRTS.


How does it improve the pregnancy care model ?
Any mother is now able to know her forthcoming baby's weight, 3 months ahead than today's commonly used method (half of the pregnancy period). Moreover, My Baby Size also offers the birth length estimation. Considering this, mothers are in much better condition to prepare themselves for the due date.

Can you tell us more about the innovation ?
My Baby Size's initiative sources on a 15 years of scientific research upon small and large foetuses. New algorythms emerged from this research, making possible to provide more accurate pregnancy estimations, just by using few data of an ultrasound scan report.

                       


Who we are ?
My Baby Size is a private & independant initiative. In-house costs to launch the service online tops $200,000 (still running). We have decided to invest this money because we strongly believe in delivering this innovative service straight to those that needed the most : the mothers.

Parents have the right to know : they are now able to reduce risks during pregnancy. Improving pregnancy care overcomes the ordinary consideration. It's all about life.

Who stands for it?
Closely implemented with the medical community and approved by the international scientific community in 2012, this innovation was unused since then. Lifted up by women who have experienced hardships during their pregnancy and men who are involved into improving e-care systems, My Baby Size has decided to deliver this service worldwide.

SUPPORT OUR PROJECT: PLEASE BUY OUR EXCLUSIVE WOMAN SHIRTS.


My Baby Size is also interested into meeting, discussing but also in collecting funds from healthcare professionals, medical organisations, governments' programs ... .

Please feel free to contact us: contact My Baby Size

story:
UPDATE 12/2/13:

We did it! Thanks to YOU, our campaign was a resounding success - markedly exceeding the goal we had set when we started!

And thanks to YOU, we were not only able to provide typhoon survivors with basic relief goods, when they needed them the most, but also empower them with the means to rebuild their lives and overcome the greatest tragedy.

Truly, thank you. Daghang Salamat!

-------

Hello! We are Odessa and Mai, Filipinos currently working in the U.S. From the other side of the world, we watched, in horror, as Typhoon Haiyan decimated our islands and claimed the lives of so many of our people. Thousands are now living in unimaginable conditions without food, clean water, light, and shelter. It's heartbreaking to see such overwhelming suffering and desperation.

We want to help, but we need YOU.

Your generous contribution can help us provide vital relief goods to those in greatest need in the Philippines right now. $10 can buy approximately 5 liters of water, 3 kilos of rice, 10 canned goods, several packets of noodles, crackers, and a bottle of paracetamol - enough to sustain a whole family for a few days. Imagine what you can do with $20! For those of us who are in the position to give, it takes so little to make such a big impact.

We are funding a small group of people based in Cebu City, Philippines, who have been taking it upon themselves to buy, pack, and distribute goods to severely affected areas in Leyte, Cebu, and its surrounding islands. It is an initiative which started with two people, and grew into a full-scale relief effort comprised of dozens of donors and volunteers.

This is a grassroots operation. Whatever money is received from this campaign will go directly to our main contact in Cebu City, Ligaya Solera-Saberon, to be used to purchase necessary materials for scheduled distribution. Rest assured, your contribution will not be encumbered by bureaucratic roadblocks, and will directly reach the people in need, in the hardest hit areas, in a timely fashion (as is possible).

Please see the ongoing operation in documents below, provided by Ligaya and her team, accounting for everything they have received - in cash and kind, what they have already accomplished and what they are still planning to do.

INFO about RELIEF OPERATIONS 
Nov 13 UPDATE on RELIEF OPERATIONS
Nov 21 UPDATE on RELIEF OPERATIONS

Thank you for your generosity!

This is a grassroots operation. Whatever money is received from this campaign will go directly to our main contact in Cebu City, Ligaya Solera-Saberon, to be used to purchase necessary materials for scheduled distribution. Rest assured, your contribution will not be encumbered by bureaucratic roadblocks, and will directly reach the people in need, in the hardest hit areas, in a timely fashion (as is possible).

Please see the ongoing operation in documents below, provided by Ligaya and her team, accounting for everything they have received - in cash and kind, what they have already accomplished and what they are still planning to do.INFO about RELIEF OPERATIONS  Nov 13 UPDATE on RELIEF OPERATIONSNov 21 UPDATE on RELIEF OPERATIONSThank you for your generosity!

story:
Carol Guscott is a beautiful and inspirational woman who has used a great tragedy in her life as a way to glorify God and uplift those around her.

She needs your help.

A very big misfortune was forced upon Carol Guscott. She’s a woman who has survived acid attacks on her face and brutality of the most severe kind. The acid that was thrown on her has left her blind, totally disfigured and destitute save for the grace of God. What remains of her life is wonderfully precious to her. 

While spreading her message of strength, love and grace and writing her inspirational book, Carol is in excruciating pain and has great medical needs. She needs your help for doctor bills, surgeries, medical procedures, and living expenses. No amount is too small and all is appreciated. Carol wants nothing more than to go on being able to touch lives with her miraculous story of strength and restoration through faith, but she can't do that without a little help.

She is offering a signed copy of her book, "Face of Hope: The Carol Guscott Story", for any donation above $25.00.

God bless you and thank you for your help!

You can also buy her book on Amazon: http://www.amazon.com/Face-Hope-Carol-Guscott/d...

story:
THANK YOU to the Atlantic Fish Company for helping host what was a resounding success of a fundraising effort yesterday morning on the one-year anniversary of the 2013 Boston Marathon.  We raised over $5,000.00 in total yesterday.  We are grateful for their tremendous support of our cause.  

UPDATE:

SO FAR WE HAVE RAISED ENOUGH MONEY FOR SEVEN FAIRINGS.  KEEP IT COMING!!!!!!!!!

We are raising funds for the amputee survivors of the 2013 Boston Marathon bombings in an effort to provide each of them with custom-made prosthetic fairings. 

There are 16 amputee survivors. We are aiming to raise funds for all 16 (two of whom have lost two limbs below the waste), one fairing at a time. Our ultimate goal is to raise $45,000 (18 fairings x $2,500) so that everyone who wants a fairing(s) can have one. Four surivivors have already met to be scanned (measured) for fairings. We need a total of $12,500 to pay for fairings for these four survivors and an additional $32,500 so that each of the remaining survivors can be fitted for a fairing(s). We will continue to raise funds so long as there are surivivors who want fairings, up to a total of $45,000  -- our ultimate fundraising goal. Any money raised in excess of the total cost of the fairings actually fitted will be used for the cost of adjustments and, if possible, replacement fairings down the road. 

We were at the Boston Marathon last year.  We were standing in the patio dining area of Atlantic Fish Company
when the second bomb went off.  We were a mere 20 feet away from that bomb.  Miraculously, not one of us was physically injured. 

We are now, those of us that were there that day, one Boston Strong family, with a tie that will forever bind us. But we feel deeply for those who were at the Marathon who were physically harmed. That is why we felt an overwhelming urge to do something to try to give back to those who were not as fortunate as us to have walked away physically unscathed.

Thus, we investigated how to help those who lost a limb.  We reached out to a company that creates custom-made prosthetic fairings for amputee victims and a local prosthetist who works with many of the amputee victims from the Marathon.  We asked if they would be willing to help us in our effort to raise funds for prosthetic fairings for the victims since fairings such as these are not covered by insurance.

Prosthetic fairings are specialized coverings that surround an existing prosthetic leg, accurately recreating the body form through a process that uses three-dimensional scanning to capture the unique leg shape. But Fairings not only return the lost contour, they invite an expression of personality and individuality that has never before been possible. 

The company that creates these custom 3D printed fairings is 3D Systems, a leading provider of 3D printing-powered design to manufacturing solutions. 3D Systems  has agreed to provide these individually-designed prosthetic fairings to Marathon amputees at cost if we are able to raise the funds needed.  United Prosthetics is a company out of Braintree, MA that has been in business for 100 years.  They treated, and continue to help treat, many of the victims of the Marathon bombings.  They have agreed to provide their time and energy in assisting with the scanning and fittings of the fairings at no cost.

There are 16 amputee victims of the Marathon bombings.  Some of the victims are double amputees.  The price per fairing runs between $2,000-$2,500 “at-cost”.  We are raising funds to pay the “at cost” expense for the amputees.  We have partnered with a non-profit corporation called American Amputee Hockey Association (A.A.H.A.) that has agreed to help hold and disburse the funds. This would allow contributions to be tax deductible.  The president of the AAHA is the physiatrist whose care the Marathon patients were under.  Additionally, some of the heads of United Prosthetics are senior board members of AAHA. 

Our initial fundraising goal on Indiegogo is the "at cost" price of one fairing.  That is why the current goal is set at $2500.  Each additional $2500 we raise will enable us to support all 16 amputee survivors.  

With the help of 3D systems, United Prosthetics, and help from your contributions we can realize our efforts of providing fairings to the amputee victims of the 2013 Boston Marathon.  

 

We would also like to thank David McCracken for introducing us to Greig Martino and United Prosthetics, Julie Pritchard for designing the wonderful logo for our cause, Matt Michienzie for producing and editing the amazing video for the campaign and The Boston College Acoustics for lending some of their musical talents to the video.

Further thanks as well to that special group of friends who worked together to make it to safety across the river on Marathon Monday, 2013 and to those who helped us along the way that day: Bryan Dempsey, Paul Michienzie, Debbie Michienzie, Emily Michienzie, Audrey Evans,Teresa Allen, Franz Lepionka, Jen Lacroix, Helen Lepionka, David Desrosiers, Bridget Roach, Lisa Corcoran, Jeremy Diflaminies, Shirley Diflaminies, Michelle McManus, Priscille Buckley, Michael Bainton, Danny Levesque, Barry Garrison, Patti Martin, Bill Martin, The Boston Police and all the first responders.

A special prayer for all those who survived the Marathon, for those who died and for all their families and loved ones.

story:
Urban Mama - No Drama foods by SistaGirl

SistaGirl Midwifery is committed to ensuring that all mamas, including low-income and poor mamas have access to quality baby food AND in typical SistaGirl fashion we want to ensure that our mamas are able to see themselves on the brand that they select.  SistaGirl 'Urban Mama-No Drama' baby food is a brand that allows urban mamas to chose a product that targets to serve them and their babies.  It is the only baby food targeted toward low-income women, urban women and women/babies of color. 

The motivation for SistaGirl is ensuring that babies have a healthy product while mamas have a trendy product.  it is a win-win for the baby.  The food is part of an educational product, and mamas who select SistaGirl have the option of signing up through our website and receiving access to all sorts of healthy advice and tips.

Why do you need to raise $25,000?

$25,000. would allow us to release the first three flavors!

 

Where will you find Urban Mama - No Drama Foods?  (SistaGirl)

Urban Mama - No Drama baby foods will not be marketed like any other baby food.  Our target markets are:

  • Corner and/or neighborhood stores that are commonly located in poor and/or food dessert communities
  • Grocery Outlets
  • WIC and other State/Federal programs

story:
With winter coming , the threat of pandemic is imminent. We have created the world's first pen-shaped EDC tool to avoid unnecessary public contact. Made with high grade materials that are durable and cost-effective, the pen is easy to use, safe and feels natural on your hands. It helps us reduce the amount of direct contact with the public surfaces we encounter in daily life, including ATM buttons, bus stop buttons, elevator buttons or doorbells. 


We have already received initial funding domestically, making our project feasible to start. We want to make the pen with high-precision moulding to give you the product with the best quality, your support will help us bring the project to live sooner and make the pen available to help the public!  

The Livsy Contact Pen is dynamic, attractive and fun! Made from high-quality, durable, and lightweight plastic, it is completely recyclable and ready for frequent use.

Inspired by futuristic and modern ergo-dynamic designs, the Livsy Contact Pen is practical, attractive and ergonomic. It has been fitted with an anti-slip surface for additional comfort during use. 

The size and shape of the Livsy Contact Pen has been carefully designed and tested to fit all hand sizes, from a small child to an adult and it can easily fit into your pocket, fanny pack or purse.

  •  The size of the Livsy Contact Pen with the Cap on:  9.46cm or 3,72 inches 
  •  The size of the Livsy Contact Pen without the Cap:  8.47cm or 3,33 inches 

The tip has been designed to work with differing button sizes, being narrow enough to hit the smaller buttons and strong enough to hit the larger ones. It can also be used in a variety of angles to allow use even in tight places.

 Sustainability is one of our major goals, and thus the Pen’s tip is completely replaceable, allowing you to simply buy a new tip to replace the old one instead of getting a new Pen. 

The Contact Pen’s base is currently available in three different colors, we have already made plans for production. And if we reach our Stretch Goals, we are planning on adding a variety of different options to allow you to customize the Pen to your personal preference.

Reaching these Stretch Goals would mean we could add more color variation to the Pen’s base and interchangeable tips, and it would also allow us to produce other versions of interchangeable tips that would further expand the functionalities of the Pen.

UPDATE: Additionally to the Strap Cord and the Ring, we are planning to soon extend the available addons with a Retractable Carabiner Keychain!

 We used modern, quick and high quality 3D printing technology to be able to test the shape and size of each iterations of the Contact Pen in a physical form in just a couple of hours time. This allowed us to modify and perfect the design before moving forward in the production. 

Available in a single, duo, family, and even a bulk sale option, the Livsy Contact Pen has a solution for all your needs. Whether you are a one person or a family, there is an option for you!

We believe people are power and when people genuinely want to help the world, things can get better. Every once in a while, a revolutionary design comes along to make the world a better place. This is our mission.

We are Livsy, we strive to help people to live a better life by creating useful daily products which are all high-quality, sophisticated and uniquely designed.

Follow Us On Our Social Media Sites As Well:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/livsycontactpen

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/livsycontactpen/

Twitter:  https://twitter.com/LivsyP

With your support we can bring this product to life and achieve this goal. We thank you for your continued support.

 Timeline and production

We are incredibly focused. We want to move fast, and we want to make sure everything works perfectly, so we refuse to put a half-finished product into production. Currently, we have finalized the process of our production methods but we are still negotiating material costs. We need to confirm an average production quantity in order to provide the most efficient costs that will allow us to ship the products to your hands.

In May-July 2020, our first prototypes were shipped to global testing sites, where they were tested by people of different ages, genders and nationalities. Now we are confident that the pen can work in all major cities. We have received feedback from the initial testers, and are currently modifying the grip and several add-ons such as better and more stylish straps for ease of use and better ring material for the user’s comfort.

Our current production schedule is optimistic, but we wish for the best and we are planning for alternatives if production happens to fall behind due to the everchanging pandemic situation. With your support, we are planning to start production in October and start shipping most of our products within December this year before the Christmas shipping peak. It is a tight schedule, and we expect that we may rely on faster and slightly more costly courier shipping services. We will update you with any changes or additional shipping cost whenever we have news.

Risks and challenges

We are a continuously running production company with years of experience gained from different fields of design and manufacturing. These experiences will help us to meet the very high production standard, and deliver the best product possible. We have already gone through several prototype testing of the Contact Pen and although we have finalized the process of our production methods, we are still negotiating material costs. We need to confirm an average production quantity in order to provide the most efficient costs that will allow us to ship the products to your hands. We surely expect certain or potential challenges in the manufacturing of the project. One of the major one is the creation of the steel mould which will allow us to produce high quantity numbers and to achieve the perfect end result. We also took into consideration a potential new wave of COVID-19, and prepared ourselves to minimize it's effect on our production. We promise to keep you updated with regular progress until you get your reward. Our target is to make a quality product to help everyone.

story:
Stylish bracelet with sanitizer!

Disinfect your hands anytime and anywhere with one click.

BAND+ is a set consisting of a bracelet and part for sanitizer. The package also includes an additional 30ml bottle of gel, intended for filling. After using this 30ml bottle, you can refill the bracelet with a disinfectant gel of your choice.

LET'S PREVENT THE SPREAD OF VIRUSES! 

&

other  bacteria.

 

The bracelet works on a simple principle of use and will convince you with an excellent effect.

Simply fill the bracelet and you can disinfect your hands all day long very practically.

 

Helps protect yourself anytime and anywhere.

                  Gym                            City transport                          Work                            Supermarket

 

Benefits of BAND+

Light, stylish and practical

Protects your health

Contains 20 single-use doses

Easy refill

Available in multiple colors

 

How does it work?

Just fill up and use it with one click.

 

How we're gonna make it

For creating Band+ bracelet, we decided to manufacture it through the injection molding process. It will help us to produce it on a larger scale and help more people by producing a bigger amount of the Band+ bracelet. The prototypes which we tested were created by 3D printing technology and the products which you see in this campaign are the same as you will get. However, we need your help, that we can order a larger amount of the bracelets to be manufactured.

WE guarantee that you will receive your bracelet right on time after the campaign finishes!

WE ARE SHIPPING ON 15 JUNE 2020 

Our goal!

We want to prevent the spread of viruses and bacteria from the very beginning. Our ambition is to make this product available worldwide.

We are also helping to spread the message of the World Health Organization, which recommends increased hand disinfection throughout the day.

 

What do we need money for?

To set the first batch of production and to start shipping it right away.

 

Thank you for supporting our project or sharing us here.

story:
Version française --> cliquez ici

What if You Could Train Your Brain to Sleep Better?

The URGOnight headband is the first daytime non-invasive brain training solution to improve sleep. Thanks to brain-controlled exercises based on neurofeedback, you will learn how to produce the brainwaves that will sustainably enhance your natural sleep, with just minutes a day.

Train Anytime Without Wearing Anything to Bed at Night

URGOnight is the first daytime training for sleep. You can practice whenever, wherever you want as it is designed to fit your busy schedule.

 Only 20 Minutes, 3 Times Per Week

For real, lasting results. Just like sports training, practice regularly to obtain sustainable results for a future filled with high-quality, natural slumber. You will feel the first benefits from 10 to 15 sessions which are about 1 month of regular practice.

 

Recently Featured in:

 

How it Works:

 

Take Control of Your Sleep with Neurofeedback

Neurofeedback is a proven method used for decades in research labs and sleep centers that allows you to learn how to modify your brain activity thanks to real-time feedback of your brainwaves in order to improve your health and performance.

Studies on Neurofeedback have proven great results on sleep:

Neurofeedback is at the core of URGOnight's technology. It's the simple mechanic of giving your brain positive audio and visual reinforcement whenever it detects that you are producing the brain waves associated with sleep improvement. With practice, you learn how to do it automatically without having to think about it.

After four years of research and development with neuroscientists and sleep experts, URGOnight brings this well-known and mastered technology into a smaller device and app. Now Neurofeedback technology is available in the comfort of your own home.


 

Get Into Bed With a Better Plan for Falling Asleep

Any idea on how to produce these specific sleep promoting brainwaves?

URGOnight is here to guide you with real-time feedback. Everyone has a different technique to produce the sleep-promoting brainwaves. URGOnight will help you identify it thanks to the real-time visual feedback of your brain activity and train it with a dedicated program. At the end of the program, your brain will have developed the ability to produce the sleep-promoting brainwaves automatically by itself without you even thinking about it.      

 

Some Common Techniques Include:

What's In The Box:

 

Tech Specs

We are On Track to Deliver

 

 

Manufacturing & Production 

 

Now Shipping! 

Sneak Peek: Unboxing! 

URGOnight is Backed Up by a Century-Old Group

URGOTech is the internal startup of the URGO Group, its innovation lab.

Created in 1880, URGO Group is a leading international healthcare group based in France and specialized in self-care and advanced wound care. The Group’s engagement has always been to “Invent & Care”. URGO Group is engaged on a day-to-day basis with patients, health care professionals, and the general public.

 

Our Mission

At URGOTech, our mission is to offer effective, accessible and scientifically proven therapies with no side effects based on brain reeducation and biofeedback. We partner with some of the best neuroscientists, researchers, and doctors to identify and understand the needs of their patients. With them, we design effective products and empowering solutions that will improve patients’ quality of life from home. 

 

Why Indiegogo?

Through Indiegogo, we are excited to be able to interact with an engaged and innovative community of early adopters like you who believe in the premise of our innovation and our mission to promote and sustain good sleep, simply and effectively. The feedback we collect on Indiegogo will give us very valuable insights that will shape future generations of the product. We can’t wait to see what our backers will have to say!

 

The URGOTech Team

 

Shipping

We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see the reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.

Starting shipping in July 2020! We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.    

*Actual delivery dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product delivery date.

By backing now you'll get to own one of the very first products off the line plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

 

PRESS KIT


 

FAQ

Is URGOnight right for me?

URGOnight will help you take control of your sleep if you are experiencing some of the following:

  • It takes you more than 30 min to fall asleep because of your busy mind
  • You wake up at the slightest sound or light in your room
  • You wake up many times during the night and can’t go back to sleep as you keep rehashing your day
  • You are so tired that you are drowsy during the day
  • You are a student or an athlete and especially in exam/competition periods
  • You sleep in a good environment: not noisy, no newborns or young children who are not sleeping well, no shift working
  • You are not affected by organic sleep troubles such as sleep apnea, restless legs, narcolepsy
  • You are not affected by a medical condition that impacts your sleep such as psychiatric illnesses, neurological diseases, pain, metabolic diseases, hormonal troubles.

In these last 2 cases, make sure you consult your doctor prior using URGOnight to see if Neurofeedback could be an adequate complement to your therapy.

Will URGOnight work for everyone?

URGOnight is a brain training program based on learning. The results of URGOnight training can therefore vary from one person to another depending on his or her own ability to learn new things.

Do note that if you have specific medical conditions, you may be able to use URGOnight in combination with current treatments, but its efficacy may be reduced. Make sure to seek advice from your doctor first.

Can URGOnight treat or help with any medical conditions?

URGOnight is not a medical device and was not designed to treat any medical condition.

If you are diagnosed with one of the following conditions, you should consult your doctor prior using URGOnight to see if Neurofeedback could be an adequate complement to your therapy:

  • Depression
  • Organic sleep troubles: apnea, hypopnea, restless syndrome, narcolepsy, hypersomnia, Kleine-Levine syndrome, somnambulism, nocturnal eating troubles
  • Pathologies disturbing sleep: cancer, degenerative, autoimmune, inflammatory, chronic or acute, hormonal disturbances
  • Epilepsy: If you are epileptic, check with your neurologist if URGOnight is compatible with your condition. As the brainwaves trained are close to the beta waves it might declare seizures in some epileptic people.
What can I expect from URGOnight?

URGOnight is a training program and as for any training, it requires time and practice to feel long-lasting benefits. Studies have shown that Neurofeedback benefits start to appear after 10 to 15 sessions -- about 3 to 5 weeks of regular practice. Don’t lose patience, it is a training for a future filled with natural slumber!

Your first session: Discover

The mobile application will guide you through an initial 30 min session. This is a step by step induction process to tailor the training to you and to make sure you understand all aspects of the training.

Sessions 1 to 3 (5): Find your technique

The first few sessions on your own may bring up some questions and incomprehension. That’s normal, it is sometimes difficult to understand what we need to do to produce the right brainwaves. URGONight will propose some examples of techniques that work for other users. By practicing the exercises with real-time feedback, you will soon be able to associate your feeling to the points you score and understand what actions lead you to success in your training.

Sessions 3 (5) to 10: Train your brain

You consolidate your training and focus on the technique that brings you the most rewards. You increase your score over the course of the sessions.

Sessions 10 onwards: Take control of your sleep

Your brain starts to learn new patterns and starts producing more sleep positive brainwaves on its own. You should start to feel the benefits including falling asleep faster, waking up less during the night.

After 40 sessions: Consolidate

Your brain has assimilated the training and you are now able to take control of your sleep.  Repeat regular conditioning sessions afterward to make sure you’re still on the right track.

What CAN'T I expect from URGOnight?
  • Getting results from day 1. This is a training and it will require practice (between 10 to 15 sessions) before you feel the first results.
  • Getting results if you don’t practice regularly as recommended by the program. To learn a new skill, regularity and practice are key. URGOnight is recommended to be used 3 times per week for a minimum of 40 sessions for sustainable results.
  • Getting results if your sleeping environment remains disturbed or if you have a medical condition that impairs your sleep.
Is Neurofeedback safe?

Neurofeedback is a totally safe reeducation program. Like behavioral therapy, it is proven to not lead to any side effects.

Special attention for epileptic people. If you are epileptic, check with your neurologist if you can use URGOnight. For some epileptic patients, given the nature of their brainwaves, neurofeedback training may declare seizures.

How does daytime neurofeedback training influence sleep?

When we sleep, the brain needs to disconnect from the outside environment to focus on physical and mental recovery. Sleep spindles are a type of brainwaves that are produced at night and they are pieces of the puzzle needed to protect your sleep from outside disturbances and achieve restorative sleep.

For some people suffering from sleep troubles, the brain produces fewer sleep spindles making their sleep more sensitive. It is, however, possible to reeducate our brain, especially with daytime neurofeedback training of the Sensorimotor brainwaves (SMR).

Research supports that training SMR waves during the day increase the production of sleep spindles during the night.

Training during the day allows your brain to assimilate the benefits of your training correctly, and increase sleep quality with no side-effects.

Have more questions? Head to our FAQ page, below:

(French FAQ page)

story:
Growing up on Detroit's East side we were like 2 peas in a pod, always together! Our parents moved us and we drifted apart, but like Bestie's will always do, we found each other! Best feeling in the world, to find the other pea that was missing from your pod. Together we want to grow a business for our family's. We want to combine our culinary backgrounds and share our delicious creations with you,  family , friends, and neighbors!

 

Funds will help with start up cost. Building build out. etc.

 

If you can't contribute you can always help by sharing our campaign!

story:
He remembers floating to the top of the room and looking down on his family gathered around his hospital bed. Good trick for a little boy pumped so full of drugs he was paralyzed.

He remembers being trapped in an elevator in Mexico, even though he never has been trapped in an elevator or been to Mexico.

He remembers traveling to Maui, another place Casey Strale, at that time, never had been to.

He remembers the details, but he doesn't remember the dying, which his dad, Chris, is pretty certain happened in there somewhere, too.

And so it was that father and son were at Children's Hospital of Orange County. A regularly scheduled check-up. The clinician looked at Casey, looked down at Casey's chart and then looked up again.

"Oh, you're 'The Miracle Kid,' aren't you?"

story:
Thinking of Marrakech conjures up pictures of Arabian nights, exotic food and music, colourful markets and lavish accommodation. But the majority of the population in Marrakech live in conditions of poverty, which is never more obvious than when you enter any of the city’s busy emergency rooms. Services that are chronically under-resourced and over-stretched struggle daily to meet the needs of their patients, and as a result those with non-life-threatening injuries or illnesses often take a back seat.

Our plan is to show these people that they are important, that they deserve one of the most basic of human rights – that of access to excellent and affordable health care. We will build an Urgent Care Centre that will treat the cohort of patients that never take priority, allowing the public hospital to focus their limited resources on more major traumas and life-threatening illnesses that require in-patient care. We will provide an environment where Moroccan and foreign health care practionners can learn and serve together to provide world-class standards of care at a minimal cost.

With the strategic use of volunteered time and donated medical equipment from overseas, it is hoped that this project, once up and running, can otherwise be funded from entirely inside Morocco. We aim to develop a sustainable and reproducible model that could be developed in other cities and areas.

In order to get the program going we need to raise the start-up funds.  This is where we are asking you and your families and your contacts, would you like to be a part of this project? Would you like to help us start something that could be a catalyst to significant improvement in many people’s lives?!

What We Need & What You Get

Initially, we need seed money.  We are hoping to raise enough to cover the costs of getting the ball rolling – including staff training, shipping donated medical equipment from Europe and the US, all the legal paperwork and set-up administration, architects fees, and advertising / marketing.  We will also need to apply for large grants to cover the new build and initial running costs.  As many of the international foundations that give start-up grants do so on a ‘matched-funding’ basis, we need people to believe in us first, and then your money can be doubled!

In return for your generosity you will get to become part of our project team.  Through our rewards you can keep up to date with all that we are doing, come visit us, and even learn a bit about Moroccan life and culture.

If we don’t reach our entire goal, every penny will still be put in to getting this project going.  If we hit 100%, still give – every penny over the 100% will go into building and initial running costs.

The Impact

We are working under the banner of Gateway Medical Alliance in partnership with other local charities.  GMA has been both a registered Moroccan and US charity since 2002, and we have experience working in healthcare and long-term charity projects in Morocco from Nador on the North Coast, to Layounne way down south in the desert.  We feel that through our cumulative experiences and using all the partnerships we have built on the ground, this is an excellent time to embark on this ambitious adventure.  We truly believe that this will have an incredible impact on the lives that need it the most, and that we can be a catalyst to encourage others to do the same.  Our moto in Gateway is "We don't give and live, we stay and serve."  We hope that this project will give us another unique opportunity to stay and serve the people of Marrakech and surrounding regions, and the local health service and health professionals.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that not all of you will be in a position to give, but if you aren’t we would still love it if you can help us.  Please let all your friends and relatives and contacts know about what we are doing, and don’t forget to share our link on your facebook / twitter / websites.

Also, if any of you think you may be in a position to offer any of your skills and expertise, we would love to hear from you.

Many thanks for all your support.

story:
Who are we and what are we doing? ¿Quienes somos y qué estamos haciendo?

- My name is Dave Chen and I'm a high school Economics teacher at Colegio Nueva Granada in Bogotá, Colombia. I've teamed up with senior Mariana Villa for her leadership project and a group of fantastic 9th graders. We are trying to raise money to purchase 60 Lifestraw Family (point of use water filters) for approximately 60 households of the Indigenous Cocama people in Southeastern Colombia. 

Currently, the Indigenous Cocama are purchasing water to drink but cooking with river water. Unfortunately, they are still getting sick from waterborne diseases. Each Lifestraw Family has the capacity to filter 18,000 liters of water or enough water for a family of 5 for 3 years. 

Directly purchasing and delivering Lifestraws will qualitatively improve the lives of the Cocama. The low cost of the Lifestraw ($120,000 COP) and the long usage (at least 3 years) will allow households to save up money over time to purchase another one for themselves, thus making the project sustainable for the future, and the Cocama will not be dependent upon us for their future water needs.


- Mi nombre es David Chen y soy profesor de economía en el Colegio Nueva Granada de Bogotá , Colombia . Me asocié con Mariana Villa de grado 12 en su proyecto de liderazgo con un grupo de estudiantes de noveno grado para recaudar fondos para este proyecto. Estamos tratando de recaudar fondos para comprar 60 Lifestraw Family         (filtros de agua que funcionan de inmediatamente) que ayudarán a aproximadamente 60 familias de los indígenas Cocama, situados en el sureste amazónico de Colombia .

Actualmente, el indígena Cocama está comprando agua para beber, pero cocina con el agua del río. Esto causa enfermedades mortales ya que millones de bacterias y enfermedades se encuentran en el agua sucia que estos están forzados a beber. Es por esto que queremos llevarle a cada familia un Lifestraw Family, para que los Cocama tengan la oportunidad de tomar agua limpia a un bajo costo que los beneficiará y les mejorará la calidad de vida inmensamente. Cada Lifestraw Family tiene la capacidad de filtrar 18.000 litros de agua, lo cual es suficiente para una familia de 5 personas por 3 años .

La compra de los Lifestraw Family y la directa entrega que se hará de estos a los Cocama mejorará mas de 300 vidas. El bajo costo de la Lifestraw ($120.000 COP) y la alta calidad y duración que estos equipos tienen (mínimo 3 años de garantía) permitirá que los Cocama en el futuro ahorren el dinero para comprar Lifestraws para sí mismos, lo cual hace que el proyecto sea sostenible para el futuro.


What We Need
Lo que necesitamos

- Each Lifestraw Family costs $120,000 Colombian pesos from www.iwanagreen.com

$120,000 X 60 = $7,200,000 Colombian pesos. 

Given that the Colombian government is trying to keep the exchange rate at 1,900 COP to 1 USD. $7,200,000 COP / 1900 = $3789.47 USD

We are looking at fundraising  $4,100 USD due to fluctuations in the exchange rate and indiegogo's estimate about what we'll get after their fees ($3.813 USD).


- Cada Lifestraw Family cuesta $120.000 COP de www.iwanagreen.com

$120 000 X 60 = $ 7,200,000 COP.1 USD cuesta 1,900 COP. Esto significa que $7,200,000 COP / 1,900 = $ 3,789.47 USD que necesitamos. 

Debido a las fluctuaciones en el precio del dólar y de IndieGoGo, después de las tasas que serán cobradas al final de la campaña, estimamos conseguir un total de $3.813 USD.


The Impact
El impacto

- Lifestraw Family is a bandage solution to the problem of unclean water in Colombia. The ideal solution would be drinking water infrastructure. In the meanwhile, we can greatly impact the lives of 330 Indigenous Cocama people and help reduce poverty and inequality in Colombia. 

Clean filtered water means fewer diseases for the Cocama, more money available to them for other uses instead of buying water, and less cutting down of the rainforest to boil water. 


- Lifestraw Family es una solución de para el problema de agua sucia y falta de agua potable en áreas de Colombia. La solución ideal sería una infraestructura sostenible de la misma. Mientras tanto, y para empezar, tendremos un gran impacto en la vida de 330 indígenas Cocama, dándoles una alternativa segura para poder tomar agua limpia sin problema.

Agua limpia y filtrada significará menos enfermedades para los Cocama tales como el cólera, la diarrea, y la gastroenteritis entre otras. Esta solución generará más dinero a disposición de los Cocama para otras necesidades en lugar de tener que conseguir agua, y disminuirá la deforestación para poder hervir el agua ya que Lifestraw Family lo hará para ellos.


Other Ways You Can Help
Otras maneras de ayudar

- Please help to spread the word and help us get more donations. Any money that we receive beyond our goal will all go towards purchasing more Lifestraws so that we can give more away next year and expand the program to other grade levels and classroom without walls trips.


- Por favor ayuda a difundir el mensaje para conseguir más donaciones. Todo el dinero que recibamos más allá de nuestra meta estará destinada para la compra de más Lifestraw Family para que este proyecto crezca para los próximos años y poder ampliar el programa a otros grados del colegio y en otros sitios de Colombia.
story_txt:
Who are we and what are we doing? ¿Quienes somos y qué estamos haciendo?
- My name is Dave Chen and I'm a high school Economics teacher at Colegio Nueva Granada in Bogotá, Colombia. I've teamed up with senior Mariana Villa for her leadership project and a group of fantastic 9th graders. We are trying to raise money to purchase 60 Lifestraw Family (point of use water filters) for approximately 60 households of the Indigenous Cocama people in Southeastern Colombia. Currently, the Indigenous Cocama are purchasing water to drink but cooking with river water. Unfortunately, they are still getting sick from waterborne diseases. Each Lifestraw Family has the capacity to filter 18,000 liters of water or enough water for a family of 5 for 3 years. Directly purchasing and delivering Lifestraws will qualitatively improve the lives of the Cocama. The low cost of the Lifestraw ($120,000 COP) and the long usage (at least 3 years) will allow households to save up money over time to purchase another one for themselves, thus making the project sustainable for the future, and the Cocama will not be dependent upon us for their future water needs.- Mi nombre es David Chen y soy profesor de economía en el Colegio Nueva Granada de Bogotá , Colombia . Me asocié con Mariana Villa de grado 12 en su proyecto de liderazgo con un grupo de estudiantes de noveno grado para recaudar fondos para este proyecto. Estamos tratando de recaudar fondos para comprar 60 Lifestraw Family         (filtros de agua que funcionan de inmediatamente) que ayudarán a aproximadamente 60 familias de los indígenas Cocama, situados en el sureste amazónico de Colombia .Actualmente, el indígena Cocama está comprando agua para beber, pero cocina con el agua del río. Esto causa enfermedades mortales ya que millones de bacterias y enfermedades se encuentran en el agua sucia que estos están forzados a beber. Es por esto que queremos llevarle a cada familia un Lifestraw Family, para que los Cocama tengan la oportunidad de tomar agua limpia a un bajo costo que los beneficiará y les mejorará la calidad de vida inmensamente. Cada Lifestraw Family tiene la capacidad de filtrar 18.000 litros de agua, lo cual es suficiente para una familia de 5 personas por 3 años .La compra de los Lifestraw Family y la directa entrega que se hará de estos a los Cocama mejorará mas de 300 vidas. El bajo costo de la Lifestraw ($120.000 COP) y la alta calidad y duración que estos equipos tienen (mínimo 3 años de garantía) permitirá que los Cocama en el futuro ahorren el dinero para comprar Lifestraws para sí mismos, lo cual hace que el proyecto sea sostenible para el futuro.What We NeedLo que necesitamos- Each Lifestraw Family costs $120,000 Colombian pesos from www.iwanagreen.com$120,000 X 60 = $7,200,000 Colombian pesos. Given that the Colombian government is trying to keep the exchange rate at 1,900 COP to 1 USD. $7,200,000 COP / 1900 = $3789.47 USDWe are looking at fundraising  $4,100 USD due to fluctuations in the exchange rate and indiegogo's estimate about what we'll get after their fees ($3.813 USD).- Cada Lifestraw Family cuesta $120.000 COP de www.iwanagreen.com$120 000 X 60 = $ 7,200,000 COP.1 USD cuesta 1,900 COP. Esto significa que $7,200,000 COP / 1,900 = $ 3,789.47 USD que necesitamos. Debido a las fluctuaciones en el precio del dólar y de IndieGoGo, después de las tasas que serán cobradas al final de la campaña, estimamos conseguir un total de $3.813 USD.The ImpactEl impacto- Lifestraw Family is a bandage solution to the problem of unclean water in Colombia. The ideal solution would be drinking water infrastructure. In the meanwhile, we can greatly impact the lives of 330 Indigenous Cocama people and help reduce poverty and inequality in Colombia. Clean filtered water means fewer diseases for the Cocama, more money available to them for other uses instead of buying water, and less cutting down of the rainforest to boil water. - Lifestraw Family es una solución de para el problema de agua sucia y falta de agua potable en áreas de Colombia. La solución ideal sería una infraestructura sostenible de la misma. Mientras tanto, y para empezar, tendremos un gran impacto en la vida de 330 indígenas Cocama, dándoles una alternativa segura para poder tomar agua limpia sin problema.Agua limpia y filtrada significará menos enfermedades para los Cocama tales como el cólera, la diarrea, y la gastroenteritis entre otras. Esta solución generará más dinero a disposición de los Cocama para otras necesidades en lugar de tener que conseguir agua, y disminuirá la deforestación para poder hervir el agua ya que Lifestraw Family lo hará para ellos.Other Ways You Can HelpOtras maneras de ayudar- Please help to spread the word and help us get more donations. Any money that we receive beyond our goal will all go towards purchasing more Lifestraws so that we can give more away next year and expand the program to other grade levels and classroom without walls trips.- Por favor ayuda a difundir el mensaje para conseguir más donaciones. Todo el dinero que recibamos más allá de nuestra meta estará destinada para la compra de más Lifestraw Family para que este proyecto crezca para los próximos años y poder ampliar el programa a otros grados del colegio y en otros sitios de Colombia.

story:
As someone who has lived with mental illness for over 20 years, I no longer feel the need to hide my issues due to shame, embarrassment, and the judgements of others. I have been "out" for many years now, and am grateful to live in a place in the world where this is even possible.

So, let's talk about it. Chances are you, or someone you know, has a mental illness. And it's as real, and as devastating, and as epidemic as any other illness. If we're comfortable talking about diabetes, heart attacks, strokes, cancer or broken bones, than we should be just as comfortable talking about mental illness.

I sometimes wish that "curing" mental illness was as simple as those "anti depressant" commercials would make you believe. We've all seen them. They're the ones where actors represent those otherwise seemingly happy people (who have careers, spouses and kids) and then, out of the blue, are hit with depression. They take whatever anti depressant is being advertised in the commercial, and, a little while later, feel themselves again.

I certainly don't mean to downplay how hard it must be to suffer from this, or any other, mental health problem. I just don't relate to it. For me, and many other inspiring people who I have come to know, mental illness is something that may never completely be "cured" or "fixed." It is more of a lifelong sort of thing (over the years, I have been diagnosed with dysthymia coupled with major depressive "episodes," generalized anxiety disorder, and traits of both borderline and obsessive compulsive personality disorders. Today, my obsessive compulsive traits are downright disabling, and revolve around what I can best describe as some sort of "neurotic perfectionism," in which I feel compelled to remember everything, and repeat the things I don't. At this very moment, I am resisting my overwhelming urge to retype what I have written for the third time, because I really want to raise some money for mental health, and telling you a bit about
me is a requirement.

So, to "sum up," I am running the race in May not because I am a "real runner," nor even because I am a particularly healthy or active human being. Truth be told, my eating habits aren't great, and I smoke and drink to excess as an unhealthy, albeit comforting, way of coping.

I am running because I recognize that exercise (and, for me, listening to music while I do it) is a more productive, and helpful, way of coping. And more importantly, I might be able to raise some money for a local, grassroots, mental health organization. This particular one is accessible, free, and does not require anyone to sit on a lengthy waiting list. And, it is run by people who have themselves experienced mental illness. Check them out at http://www.mooddisordersottawa.ca.

With Gratitude,

Lynne
