story:
We'd love you to join our growing community of people benefiting from 4Jointz. 

We're so happy to see a growing community of people benefiting from 4Jointz.

We appreciate the launch support from the IGG community and so are extending our launch discounts for a limited time. 

You can benefit from our special discounts now - go to the right and click on your selected package. 

Select your package on the right under Perks!

 

What is 4Jointz?

Pain medications can have devastating side effects. But they're not your only option. 4Jointz® is made from nature and backed by science.

4Jointz is a clinically tested, natural topical cream for long-term relief of painful, stiff, swollen joints including osteoarthrits.

 

 

A Tangible, Effective Solution for Pain & Stiffness

4JOINTZ® is made from nature and backed by science. 4JOINTZ® is a unique and powerful synergistic blend of standardized botanical extracts. Unlike most treatments which are administered orally, 4JOINTZ® is applied topically (through the skin)  directly to the affected joints targeting the pain, stiffness and swelling.

                

Who Should Use 4Jointz?

Everyone who is suffering from painful, stiff and swollen joints including: knee, shoulder, hand, back, neck, feet, hip, and Elbow.

 
 

Clinically-Tested, Safe & Effective

4Jointz® is trusted and used by doctors for their patients. Clinical Trial results of 4Jointz® have shown:

  •         A statistically significant reduction in pain, swelling, and stiffness.
  •         A statistically significant increase in mobility and leg muscle strength.
  •         A meaningful reduction of 400mg per day usage of paracetamol.
  •         Long-lasting results.
  •         An overall improved quality of life.

 

What 4Jointz Users Say:

We've given some samples out over the years as we've been developing and researching 4Jointz®. These are the kinds of results that have kept us going. Scroll down and find out how 4Jointz® is changing people's lives.

 

In the Media

4Jointz® has been Featured in the Australian Channel 7 News and is supported by the Australian Government through their "Landing Pad" initiative, where 4Jointz® was one of eight companies across Austraila selected to participate within the RocketSpace ecosystem - a leading technology incubator in San Francisco.

 

Easy to Apply

Applying 4Jointz® is quick and easy. People have achieved exceptional results by applying 3 times daily for a recommended 2 -3 months. The following  video demonstrates how to apply 4Jointz® properly to various joints. For best results:

  1. Apply the 4Jointz® cream on all sides of the joint.
  2. Lightly massage it in gently with the tips of your fingers for a minute or two until completely absorbed; it is important to apply and massage into ALL sides of the joint until it is totally absorbed leaving the skin completely dry.
  3. For sensitive skin it is recommended that you wash or wipe off the joint thoroughly (especially areas such as the soft skin behind the knee joint) with warm water or a damp cloth 10 minutes after application.
  4. The two tubes in each pack are sufficient for three daily applications for one knee joint or both hands for one month.
  5. Two or three additional packs may be required. Major weight bearing joints would require additional product.
  6. Dark coloured towels are recommended to avoid possible staining should excess cream be left on the skin.
 

 

Who Are We?

The 4Jointz® team is a passionate and entrepreneurial team. After ten years of product development including extensive clinical testing in the USA, New Zealand and Australia, with community support we can bring the benefits of 4Jointz® to the millions of people looking to improve their quality of life. We believe that 4Jointz® is a game changer for the healthcare industry, where a better solution for Arthritis has been sought for decades.

 

"As the Founder, it has always been my intention to offer 4Jointz as a premium but affordable treatment of choice to as many people as possible worldwide to help them regain a quality of life, avoid the well published side effects and the ongoing costs of pain medication.

We are not a large corporatation but have remained determined to ensure the quality of the product and the supporting research are of the highest standards. We welcome your support!"

Persis Anderson

Founder & Entrepreneur 

 

FAQs

When can I buy 4JOINTZ®?

4Jointz® is available and shipping now - benefit from our special launch discounts now. 

How soon can I expect to see results? 

Most people start to experience some beneficial changes within the first few days and some within the first couple of weeks. Since osteoarthritis severity can vary, so can the application period for 4Jointz®. On average, the standard protocol for application is 8 -12 weeks. Once optimal results have been obtained, a tapering maintenance program is recommended to once a day and then 3 times weekly down to as and when required.

Are there any side effects?

There are no known side effects other than in rare cases, some users with dry or sensitive skin could develop a mild skin rash. If skin rash occurs cease using the product for sometime before trying again in a limited area, washing the area with warm soapy water ten minutes after application.

What is in 4Jointz® that makes it so effective? 

4Jointz® is a unique and powerful synergistic blend of standardized botanical extracts specifically produced for 4Jointz®. Unlike most treatments which are administered orally, 4JOINTZ® is applied topically (through the skin)  directly to the affected joints targeting the pain, and additional challenges associated with joint discomfort.

Will I have to continue using 4Jointz® ?

4Jointz® is initially recommended for use three times a day for approximately 12 weeks. Subsequently, depending on your condition, applications can be tapered off to as and when required depending on individual requirements, to provide long-lasting benefit.

I've had a bad experience with other creams, is there any menthol or capsaicin in the 4Jointz®  formula?

So many people ask us this question! There is NO menthol or capsaicin in 4Jointz® as this is a unique, natural and well-researched formula. You're mindful about how you treat your joint pain and want to know what you’re using on your body—we understand completely. We've gone out of our way to not include menthol or capsaicin in our cream making it completely different to any product on the market today.

Can I continue to use other treatments in conjunction with 4Jointz® ?

Continuing with another treatment is left to you and your healthcare practitioner's discretion. 

How much of the 4Jointz® cream should I use?

The amount of cream used is dependent on the size of the joint. Sufficient cream should be used to completely envelope the joint with each application and massaged in thoroughly until the skin is completely dry to touch.

What if I use more or less 4Jointz® cream than is in each tube?

It is advisable to use the cream at the recommended dosage as insufficient application may not achieve the desired results.

Is it okay to wash my hands after applying the cream?

Yes. However, if you are treating your hands we recommend you wait 5-10 minutes before washing to ensure the cream has been fully absorbed into your skin.

I know I’m supposed to apply 4Jointz® three times daily, but what if I miss an application?

If an application is missed simply continue to apply the cream according to the regular schedule. If more than two consecutive days are missed or applications are missed frequently, you may need to start the 12-week application period over again.

How many applications will I get from one box?

This will depend upon the size and number of joints you are applying the cream to. Sufficient cream should be used to completely envelope the joint with each application and massaged in thoroughly until the skin is completely dry to touch.

One pack of two tubes(3.5oz / 100g each tube - total 7oz / 200g) is sufficient for both hands or one knee joint for around one month. For optimal results, use two to three additional packs over a period of two to three months.

story:
Recently Featured In

The Independent Alligator           The Palm Coast Observer

Review by George Bruno 

To Get a Brush sent out today*

Choose the 2nd Wave Perk -->

 

Great For

Styling Beards & Hair            Conditioning the Beard      Short or Long beards

Locking in Moisture                Feels & Smells Great           Reducing Waste   

Unique Valentine's Gift          Beards Feel Fuller                Beards Look Fuller

 

Quick Facts

  • All our Beeswax is locally sourced
  • No Animal Testing
  • No Dyes
  • No Perfumes
  • No Artificial Ingredients
  • Use only 100% pure Essential Oils
  • Handmade by Me

Every Tuesday Night (@ 7:00pm) of our campaign we will be offering special backer perks in VERY limited quantities.  Remember to check back frequently (*read set an alarm on your phone) to claim these rewards.

Summary

The Beard Balm Brush from By Odin's Beard! Inc. is a BRUSH made out of beard balm.  The Beard Balm Brush is the simplest way to get beneficial beard balm onto a person's beard or other hair.  Plus, it feels & smells great.  

Most other balms on the market require people to: 

1) scrape the balm out of a tin,

2) rub it in their hands *sticky*,

3) apply it to the surface of their beard,

4) brush or comb it down past the surface,

5) then try to wash the balm off of your hands,

6) notice how cool it is when the water beads up on your hands,

7) wipe your eyes with a towel because you of course touched them with your sticky balm hands, 

and then

8) call your boss to tell them that they are late to work because having a groomed beard takes ages.

With the Beard Balm Brush you simply 

1) brush your beard.  

And, you

2) still have to call your boss to explain you are late but this time it is because you were complimenting yourself in the mirror.

People love our brushes for styling their beards, mustaches, and any hair in a way that helps to moisturize and condition it while adding a pleasing scent and feel.

The tines of the brush give a gentle face massage when applying that users find tough to resist.

It is difficult for me to describe here just how excited people get when they see and use our brushes.

What is a Beard Balm??

For the people that don't know, a beard balm is a concoction of luscious ingredients that is applied to a beard to help style, moisturize, and condition the beard along with other benefits.

Our balms are especially alluring because they contain only natural ingredients, are purpose specific, and are great not just for the hair but the skin also.  In fact, we have users who are bald and apply the Beard Balm Brush directly to their scalp.

Many other quality balms retail for $20+ 

Background

Me

My name is Jordan.  I studied Entrepreneurship at the University of Florida, and I am an inventor.  This project is important to me because, probably a lot like you, I love to think up different ideas for products, movies, and all sorts of projects to improve people's lives.

Indiegogo connects me with people that are like minded, and who want to be part of the finished product.

The Brush

There were 2 main motivators that lead me to develop this product.

1)  Artificial Products aggravated me - I am not talking about they just made me upset - they physically aggravated me.  Whenever I would use any store bought hair products (yes, even the expensive ones & yes, I originally made this for the hair on my head.) then about 30 minutes later, my eyes would start to itch like crazy until I washed the product out.  So, I started using just beeswax and slowly added ingredients to the blend that would not irritate me.

2) Ease of Use - After I had developed the hair product, I realized just how time consuming it is to use balms.  Taking a long time grooming my beard or hair is not my idea of fun. If I was going to use this on a daily basis, I knew that it had to be faster and easier.  And, that is how the Beard Balm Brush was born.

Description of the Brush

The Beard Balm Brush while simple in concept is nuanced in design.  There are 2 layers to the brush.

A first layer (the balm layer) is lighter in color and consists of A) nourishing carrier oils, like: jojoba, almond, hemp, apricot kernel, argan, coconut and, or others, B) butters such as shea butter, or cocoa butter, and C) powerful essential oils we are talking rosemary, peppermint, cedar wood, lemon, lavender amongst many others, and of course D) pure beeswax.  This first layer is creamier in nature and is a beard's delight.  It is present on the tines and face of the brush to promote an even and penetrating application.

The 2nd layer is 100% beeswax.  This layer is firmer in nature and is formed to make a handle.  There are times when the bearded user may want to apply just beeswax to their beard.  It can lock in moisture, and help with styling, providing a firmer hold - amongst other benefits.  Users wanting to apply pure beeswax can simply rub the handle on their beard or mustache.

Varieties of the brush that are currently available are: Paul Bunyan: for soothing, Treebeard: for growth, and Ann (just bland).

 

 

 

Perk Central (or was it Central Perk?)

Most of our perks have to do with receiving some number of brushes by a certain deadline.  Please read the perks carefully so that you know when you are scheduled to receive any given perk.

 

The different quantity amounts are as follows: Single Brush (of your choice), 3-pack, and 1-year subscription

The delivery times are as follows: Now (see our note on shipping), in time for Valentine's Day, and November.

Now: Early Adopters and 2nd wavers will get the product as soon as possible.  We have already started production to ensure that these really will go out "now."  For being so brave, these backers get a discount.

Valentine's: Next come the Valentine's beards.  Our brushes make a mighty handsome gift for the romantic day, especially for guys that take pride in their facial hair. We will make every effort to ship out your brush in time for the big day.  Please be patient.  Please order ASAP if you want your brush on time.  And, make certain that the shipping information that you enter is complete and correct.  We will enforce cut off dates to help prevent any sad beards.

Also, there is a chance that we may open more Valentine backer levels up.  We will most likely only do so after all of the first wave of Valentine's backers have been produced AND shipped.  The best time to order a Valentine's gift is now while you are thinking about it and before we hit our limits.  Long story made short - order as soon as possible.

The Goal

We are trying to raise $30,000 with our campaign.  We will then use that money to make the best beard balm on the market.

1) Determine the Demand - Honestly, I don't know if I will still be making these brushes 5 years from now.  They might just be a fun 1 time thing.  But, seeing how close we get to the $30,000 goal will tell us pretty directly how much of a demand exists.  We have already sold some brushes at local farmers markets and have received an overwhelming response.  So we are very optimistic. But, if you want to see these brushes available in stores and online, now is the time to show us.  Show us by ordering one.

2) Protect Our Idea - At least a portion of the funds will go towards protecting the idea.  There currently is a patent pending.  This is important because without proper protection innovators can get steamrolled by giant corporations.

3) Invest in Manufacturing - Crowdfunding is a powerful tool for getting the funds needed to invest in production.  We will use funds to make more molds, develop packaging, and perhaps a physical space depending on several factors.  If a large quantity of our brushes are ordered for the Valentine's Day deadlines then additional equipment will be purchased immediately to keep up with demand.  We will also start to create inventory for order fulfillment.

4) Expand our Ideas - The Beard Balm Brush is just one of the products that we want to offer at By Odin's Beard!  We have a whole line of amazing products that we are going to offer and we can't wait to start working on them.  Your support will not only make this product possible but all of those future ones as well.

5) Protect Whimsy - More and more often crowdfunding projects are just turning into pre-sale sites for big companies with lots of resources like professional marketing teams, camera crews, and all that jazz.  I don't harbor any ill-will toward them.  But, one of the true beauties and I think original purposes of crowdfunding was to give hope to a girl or guy that had nothing but a cool idea for a fun project and two willing hands.  

That is what I have.

There is no camera team - so please forgive the editing - just occasionally my girlfriend or a buddy.    There is no marketing budget.  I am the marketing team, until I trick one of my friends into helping out.  But just because I don't have those things, it does not mean that this idea does not deserve a fair shot.  So, when you back this campaign, you are backing a person, and you are declaring boldly with your actions that these projects are important and that whimsy is still alive.

The Risks

The biggest risk that we face is not enough people finding out about our campaign.  The product is already production ready.  The initial tools and molds are being built as quickly as possible.  We have already had some great success at local markets and events. This project is ready to soar.  However, we can not succeed if people do not share our campaign.  So, please share the link, tell your friends, remember that this can be used for all hair not just beards (well...maybe not nose, hair, or belly hair - you know what? lets just stick to hair on our heads and not in any crevices).  And, get the word out.  If you know of any media outlets, or Facebook groups, that may be interested, please message me about them.

Share it!

If you think that this is a good idea, please share it.  If you hate the idea but know someone that may think that it is a good idea, please share it.  If you hate the idea, and you think that everyone you know will hate the idea, and possibly insult you for sharing it, please share it.  Our campaign lasts only 60 days.  After that, you may never see something like this again.

Other lesser risks:

Sickness - When you have a 1 person crew, a sickness can really muck things up.  We will mitigate against this via communication.  If I were to get sick, I would notify backers immediately, stop taking any new time-sensitive perk backers on and coordinate a way for someone else to fulfill the existing orders.

Supplier failure - I do not harvest the wax myself.  However, I do use only local Florida apiaries and there are several in the area.  So, this risk is minimal.

Campaign error - There may be some sort of misunderstanding about the product, goals, or perks.  Again, communication will be key.  There is a link where potential backers can message me.  If you see something wrong, or don't understand something, or have a question please message me. You are welcome to contact me regarding any of those topics.

We will be adding appropriate stretch goals.  We only developed the product very recently.  But, we wanted to let people get their hands on the product in time for Valentine's Day.  So, please bear with us as we get our campaign together!

 

The Fine Print

A word of caution:

You may be allergic to one, some, or all of the ingredients used in our brushes or packaging.  If you are, please do not use or handle the brushes.  If you don't know, please proceed with caution and be careful.  Essential Oils can be powerful.  Women pregnant or nursing should only handle or use after consulting a qualified health care professional.  My brushes and any claims made have not been tested and/or reviewed by the FDA.  

Also, for people that are not familiar with wax or balms, they tend to melt (see our note on shipping below).  It is probably not a good idea to leave the brush in your hot car or anywhere else that it might melt.  This may seem like common sense to some, but I don't want any sad beards because people did not know.  Lastly, dogs really like to eat wax.  This Beard Balm Brush is not intended for consumption by humans or dogs (but maybe werewolves) so be careful not leave it where your dog or friend may eat it.

 

Note(s) on Shipping

Wax melts.  The brushes are wax.  We don't want the wax to melt before you get to use it.  So, we may wait to ship certain perks until the following Monday or Tuesday so as to not have people's brushes sitting in hot warehouses or delivery trucks over the weekends.  Please open your package when it arrives.  While the risk of melting is minimal in the winter months, we want to help anyone whose product is damaged.  However, we also don't want people abusing the system.  So, we will ask for pictures to be sent of the brush(es) within a reasonable time (like a day) of receiving their package.  Please don't let it sit on your doorstep in the sun for a week and then wonder what happened.

When we say that we will ship something the same day, we mean any same-day backer perks that are claimed before 2pm on any given day should go out that same shipping day.  Perks claimed after 2pm will be sent out on the next shipping day.  So, not on Sunday and possibly not on Thursday or Friday depending on expected heat etc.  Also, the shipping cost for the U.S. factors in a small amount of handling and packaging costs.  We will handle international shipping on a case by case basis.

story:
WAVEWEAR® QUICKFIT combines the therapeutic benefits of Kinesiology taping and the protection of athletic taping with a functional supporter for use while engaging in athletic and sports activities.



QUICKFIT’s inner surface of adhesive silicone grasps and releases the skin. 
This action improves blood circulation to the underlying muscle while reducing lactic acid by as much as 35%.





Your Training & Sports with WAVEWEAR® QUICKFIT

  • Indoor sports user

  : Fitness, Yoga, Health, Bowling, Badminton, Squash, Swim, Dance, Fencing, Climbing, Gymnastics, Weight lifting, Skating, Wrestling, Boxing, Shooting, Judo, Taekwondo, etc...

  • Outdoor sports user

 : Running, Marathon, Cycle(Bike), Tennis, Baseball, Golf, Rugby, Canoe, Cross-Country, Horse-riding, Ski-jump, Rowing, Yacht, Athletics, Archery, etc...

  • School sports user

  : Basketball, Volleyball, Soccer(Football), Futsal, Hockey, Handball, Table-tennis(Ping pong), Badminton, Softball, etc...




Your Daily Life with WAVEWEAR® QUICKFIT

  •  Bus, Train, Taxi, Van drivers & Delivery mans etc, Drivers.
  •  Business professionals need to fly for a long time due to travel.
  • Work stand most of the day, mart & service industry workers.
  • Sitting at a desk for long hours of desk work and study students.




1>Milking Action Effect

This action helps the underlying muscle push the blood back to the heart and lungs as with the soleus muscle on the back of the calf that has the task of pushing blood back up the leg, the second heart of the human body.

                                


2>Reduce Fatigue Causing Substances

QUICKFIT helps reduce the amount of fatigue causing lactic acid that accumulates in muscles during strenuous activity through the improved blood flow for harder and longer performance.


3>Breathable and Soft

QUICKFIT is made of soft breathable fabric that helps to balance skin temperature and is anti-Itch. The design provides for a full range of motion and superior mobility without irritation or chafing.



4>Taping Effect

QUICKFIT was developed to provide the benefits of taping without the drawbacks or discomforts. QUICKFIT is easy to put on and the medically certified silicone that contacts with the wearer’s skin helps avoid any problems. It also engages the gate control theory that helps relieves pain.


5> Faster Recovery

QUICKFIT’s unique silicone taping technology supports muscles improve blood circulation during physical activity. It helps the muscles recovery faster and reduces swelling. The improved blood circulation also helps relieve pain through the gate control theory.




Kinesiology tape is an that is used for treating athletic injuries and a variety of physical disorders. For the first decade after its introduction practitioners in Japan were the main users of the therapeutic kinesiology tape. By 1988 the tape had been adopted by Japanese Olympic and professional athletes before spreading across the world.


You would have noticed that more an more professional athletes use kinesiology taping improve their sporting performance, prevent injury and allow them to return to sport quicker.






If the adhesion faints or some of the substances do not fall off after cleaning, using a dry cloth and alcohol wipe the inner silicone and then you would able to see the adhesive silicone condition as you’ve experienced at the first time you used them!


Our company has developed a pattern of Bio-Adhesive silicone independently developed by using medical silicone parts similar to the cohesion of the Kinesiology Taping and considering muscle mapping for effectiveness.





Taping as well as there is little parts that can be ordered alone, non-professionals is almost the same effect simply wear taping professionals such as physical therapists, trainers come by, while our products are parts that need to know well the muscles map obtain. 

Although muscle tape is disposable, Quickfit is a permanent product.

QUICKFIT was developed to provide the benefits of taping without the drawbacks or discomforts. 


QUICKFIT is easy to put on and the medically certified silicone that contacts with the wearer`s skin helps avoid any problems.





Our innovative calf sleeve is the result of five years of research and development and it delivers a number of significant functions through the use of 3.6g of adhesive silicone and the new biological technology of Kinesiology taping.


What is the W.A.S. Method?

W.A.S. Method is Wave Adhesive Silicongel Method. Inner adhesive silicone lifts up skin, helps lymph circulation, reduces fatigue and helps blood flow smoothly.



WAVEWEAR is a result of the combination of functional supporter and biological taping.
The unique silicone taping technology supports muscles to improve blood circulation during physical activity. It helps the muscles recovery faster and reduces swelling. 



<Inha Univ. Sports Leisure Textile Research Center>

Inspired by athletic and the kinesiology taping effect, WAVEWEAR Quickfit features a milking-action effect and it helps reduce lactic acid(fatigue) based on testing. Soft breathable fabric helps to balance skin temperature and is anti-Itch.




Fabric 
- blocking at least 97% of UV energy
- Polyester 80%, Spandex 20% (Rad Series)
- Nylon 80%, Spandex 20% (Basic Black)


Silicone 
- ODOROSO Bio-A Silicone












ODOROSO Co., Ltd, since its establishment as a sports medicine professional company in 2010, imported various sports medical supplies, including sports tape and supporters and sports medicine goods.

We found a demand of the market for a more convenient in way to apply taping and started developing for a new product since 2012. The functional sports wear, ‘WAVEWEAR’ which gives immediately taping effect by just wearing it easily.

By the concept of combining Kinesiology taping and athletic taping with supporters and apparels, this helps recovery and reduces lactic acid especially in activities.





ODOROSO Research team

starting from the left side of the photo Sangchul Lee , Dong-Jin, Kun-Kuk, Nancy Cho, Hae-Sung Jang, Mark Lee, Ji-Sung Han, Sam Hwang and outside of the photo; Andrew Cho, UeChul Jang)

We are a team of consumer products and sports therapy entrepreneurs with over 6 years of product development, manufacturing, and retail experience. We are passionate about bringing new products to market in a way they have never been done before.

Press-Kit    <== Click

Contact-Us    <== Click

4>Taping Effect
QUICKFIT was developed to provide the benefits of taping without the drawbacks or discomforts. QUICKFIT is easy to put on and the medically certified silicone that contacts with the wearer’s skin helps avoid any problems. It also engages the gate control theory that helps relieves pain.




5> Faster Recovery
QUICKFIT’s unique silicone taping technology supports muscles improve blood circulation during physical activity. It helps the muscles recovery faster and reduces swelling. The improved blood circulation also helps relieve pain through the gate control theory.








Kinesiology tape is an that is used for treating athletic injuries and a variety of physical disorders. For the first decade after its introduction practitioners in Japan were the main users of the therapeutic kinesiology tape. By 1988 the tape had been adopted by Japanese Olympic and professional athletes before spreading across the world.
You would have noticed that more an more professional athletes use kinesiology taping improve their sporting performance, prevent injury and allow them to return to sport quicker.












If the adhesion faints or some of the
substances do not fall off after cleaning, using a dry cloth and alcohol wipe
the inner silicone and then you would able to see the adhesive silicone
condition as you’ve experienced at the first time you used them!




Our company has developed a pattern of Bio-Adhesive silicone independently developed by using medical silicone parts similar to the cohesion of the Kinesiology Taping and considering muscle mapping for effectiveness.














Taping as well as there is little parts that can be ordered alone, non-professionals is almost the same effect simply wear taping professionals such as physical therapists, trainers come by, while our products are parts that need to know well the muscles map obtain. 
Although muscle tape is disposable, Quickfit is a permanent product.



QUICKFIT was developed to provide the benefits of taping without the drawbacks or discomforts. 


QUICKFIT is easy to put on and the medically certified silicone that contacts with the wearer`s skin helps avoid any problems.









Our innovative calf sleeve is the result of five years of research and development and it delivers a number of significant functions through the use of 3.6g of adhesive silicone and the new biological technology of Kinesiology taping.







What is the W.A.S. Method?
W.A.S. Method is Wave Adhesive Silicongel Method. Inner adhesive silicone lifts up skin, helps lymph circulation, reduces fatigue and helps blood flow smoothly.






WAVEWEAR is a result of the combination of functional supporter and biological taping.The unique silicone taping technology supports muscles to improve blood circulation during physical activity. It helps the muscles recovery faster and reduces swelling. 






<Inha Univ. Sports Leisure Textile Research Center>
Inspired by athletic and the kinesiology taping effect, WAVEWEAR Quickfit features a milking-action effect and it helps reduce lactic acid(fatigue) based on testing. Soft breathable fabric helps to balance skin temperature and is anti-Itch.







Fabric - blocking at least 97% of UV energy- Polyester 80%, Spandex 20% (Rad Series)- Nylon 80%, Spandex 20% (Basic Black)



Silicone - ODOROSO Bio-A Silicone








































ODOROSO Co., Ltd, since its establishment as a sports medicine professional company in 2010, imported various sports medical supplies, including sports tape and supporters and sports medicine goods.
We found a demand of the market for a more convenient in way to apply taping and started developing for a new product since 2012. The functional sports wear, ‘WAVEWEAR’ which gives immediately taping effect by just wearing it easily.
By the concept of combining Kinesiology taping and athletic taping with supporters and apparels, this helps recovery and reduces lactic acid especially in activities.


















ODOROSO Research team
starting from the left side of the photo Sangchul Lee , Dong-Jin, Kun-Kuk, Nancy Cho, Hae-Sung Jang, Mark Lee, Ji-Sung Han, Sam Hwang and outside of the photo; Andrew Cho, UeChul Jang)
We are a team of consumer products and sports therapy
entrepreneurs with over 6 years of product development, manufacturing, and
retail experience. We are passionate about bringing new products to market in a
way they have never been done before.

story:
Project Summary

The goal of this project is to improve patient morale and quality of care through providing books/magazines, games and other activities to TB patients at the Church of Scotland Hospital. We often forget that simple measures, like providing entertainment, can have a positive impact on patients, such as reducing the need for painkillers, limiting depression, and improving appetite. Contributing to the potential emotional needs of patients can speed up recovery, improve patient care, and ultimately reduce healthcare costs. Normally there is a 2-3 month waiting list to admit patients to the TB ward. These patients are too sick to live independently at home, and thus require hospitalization. Speeding up recovery for current inpatients and opening new beds to individuals with TB in the community not only decreases mortality in this group but also prevents the spread of the disease.
In 2005, 53 patients at the Church of Scotland Hospital (Tugela Ferry, South Africa) were diagnosed with a deadly and virtually untreatable form of tuberculosis (TB). Of these extreme drug resistant (XDR)-patients, only one survived with the average rate of mortality occurring within 16 days of presenting at the hospital. These cases represent the first reported XDR- TB outbreak and remains one of the leading areas of HIV-associated XDR-TB globally.

The Church of Scotland Hospital is a major source of medical care to the 172,000 individuals living in the Msinga sub-district surrounding Tugela Ferry in the province of KwaZulu-Natal in South Africa. Msinga is the poorest sub-district in South Africa, with high TB (>1000/100,000 pop.) and HIV burden (>30% pop.). Therefore the hospital has been at the centre for research, clinical and programmatic responses to both TB and HIV in the country.

The Church of Scotland Hospital contains both a male and female ward with approximately 80 bedridden patients at any given time. In a recent visit to these wards, we spoke with the hospital staff to get a better understanding of some of the greatest challenges associated with having TB that requires hospitalisation.  They informed us that the length of hospitalization significantly reduced patient morale and resulted in feelings of isolation and dispiritment. Generally, these patients remain in hospital for 6-9 months, and sometimes over a year. Limited resources at this hospital solely permit these wards to be equipped with basics for patient care (beds, medical equipment, etc.) and provide no source of entertainment for these individuals (TVs, phones, magazines, etc.). Furthermore, due to extreme poverty in the area, it is not feasible for families to visit regularly and patients do not have many personal items.

What We Need

Donations will be used strictly for the following items:

  • Books and magazines (languages: mainly Zulu, but also Xhosa, English, Afrikaans)
  • Games (Including: cards, chess, checkers, finger snooker, etc.)
  • Shelving and storage units for books/magazines and games in the wards

The Impact

Immediate impact on TB inpatient quality of care by providing:
  • Diversion of the patient's attention from their current health situation
  • Patients with the ability to read whilst in bed
  • Opportunity for patients to interact and create relationships with one another through games
  • Educational resources

Project Details

Funds and transport: 

  • The leaders of the project, Gary Parker and Melissa Richard-Greenblatt, are solely responsible for collecting funds, and purchasing of books/magazines, games and storage equipment. They will also directly transport all items collected in Durban, KwaZulu-Natal to the TB wards at the Church of Scotland Hospital. With the assistance of the senior medical officer, Dr. Moll, and ward nurses (sisters) the project leaders will set up the library 
Literacy and familiarity with games:
  • The staff have given a basic indication of the general patient literacy level (majority of patients literate in Zulu) and have identified a list of games known to patients
Zulu books:
  • Zulu books are difficult to come across. We have an arrangement with Adams Bookseller (Durban, South Africa) to acquire Zulu books from local publishers and purchase these books at a discounted price. This supplier has also generously donated a collection of 40 Zulu books to our project.
Library space and maintenance:
  • Both the male and female TB wards have set aside a small area to place two shelving units for books and storage bins for games. All items will be labelled as property of the Church of Scotland Hospital TB wards. Nursing staff from each ward will oversee that library items stay within the ward and are shared between patients.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Spread the word about our Church of Scotland TB ward book/game drive to other researchers, family members and friends
  • Raising awareness of TB in your local community

*All images taken with permission from previously published  sources

story:
Knowledge Fuels Improvement:

The MORE you know
The SMARTER you train
The BETTER you perform

Immediate and consistent feedback is needed for improvement, but...

 

 “I can’t see the damn clock!”

Feedback in the pool doesn’t come easy.  Goggles get foggy. It’s hard to hear.  Pace clock math is tricky. Watches are hard to see and buttons are hard to find & press. 

“Doing the same thing & expecting different results is the definition of insanity”

Swim performance feedback hasn’t changed much in the last 40 years. Continuing to improve requires doing things differently than the way they’ve always been done.

“Other sports have feedback, why not swimming?” 

  

Improvement requires immediate and consistent feedback.  In running, just flip your wrist.  In biking, peek at the handlebars.  In swimming?  Not so much. 

“I’m not here to go through the motions”

Feedback keeps you honest and keeps you motivated. Feedback let’s you know if you’re on track or need to kick it up a notch.

Help is on the way...

 

Firebelly is a patent pending, first of its kind, bone conduction audio swim performance monitor. It measures every part of your swim - analyzing times, stroke count, and stroke rate for each length.  Firebelly is designed to improve your swimming with the most advanced analytics possible. 

  • Instant Feedback: Make real-time adjustments with instant performance feedback via bone conduction audio
  • Review Data: Analyze performance data, track your progress, and identify opportunities for improvement with the free smartphone app

Whether you are a beginner or an advanced swimmer, Firebelly was made for you.  It has no wires, no earbuds, no buttons to fumble with, no trying to see a small screen through foggy goggles.  Just hit a button, swim, and get crystal clear audio feedback to fuel better performance and help you achieve your swimming goals. 

Better Feedback.  Better Swimmers.

 

*Requires purchase of Head Position feature

 

 

The free Firebelly App is available for iOS and Android.  The app uses Bluetooth to pair with the device in order to view workout data and program custom feedback modes.  Swim data that can be viewed in the app includes:

  • Total Time
  • Splits (per per 25, 50, 100)
  • Cumulative time
  • Stroke Count per length (SC)
  • Stroke Rate per length (SR)

 

“No matter what mode I tune it to, it tells me the same thing: ‘Go Faster!’”
“It provides a self-kick in the ass”
“I don’t go to the pool to go through the motions. This alerts me if I’m falling off and gets me back on track.”
“Helps me swim faster”
“Keeps me honest”
“For 20 swimmers you would need more than a dozen stopwatches to give all of the feedback that Firebelly can give those swimmers”

 

Some Firebelly Fans:

 

 

Firebelly was designed to be as seamless to integrate with your workout as a pair of fins or a pull buoy.  With its easy to use design Firebelly can go from your equipment bag to ready to give swim feedback in less than 20 seconds.  Modes are set up to allow you to select the type of feedback you’d like to receive; e.g. time, stroke count, stroke rate, etc. The type of feedback can be selected based on the training goal of the set or workout.

Firebelly's sensors collect over 800 data points each second and advanced algorithms are tuned to detect swimming-specific movements.  Bone conduction audio assures that you can hear the swimming feedback in the water by bypassing the ear canal and conducting audio through the cranial bones directly to your inner ear.  Swim performance data is stored on the device during your workout and can be viewed with the free mobile app.   

 

Firebelly is easy to use and can unlock your potential and help you achieve your swimming goals.

 

Time 

Firebelly automatically gives you highly accurate times while you swim.  You can select which splits you want to hear (e.g. each length or every other length for longer swims).  It also announces your total time at the end of each swim.  Hearing your splits and times lets you know if you are on track and helps you lock in your sense of pace.

Stroke Count & Stroke Rate

Stroke count and stroke rate are both important measures of swimming efficiency and are key to swimming fast.  Firebelly automatically detects the type of stroke you are swimming and counts the number of strokes you take per length.  Firebelly calculates and announces your stroke rate in either seconds per cycle or cycles per minute depending on your preference.  

Cadence

Cadence mode on Firebelly provides stroke rate guidance with traditional tempo training "beeps" which, unlike a traditional tempo trainer, start & stop when you do.  Firebelly also provides advanced cadence features.  The device can be configured to provide cadence beeps only on the odd lengths allowing you to get a sense of swimming with the rate guidance and then trying to hold the rate on your own.  Another option provides a learning mode where Firebelly detects your stroke rate on the first length and automatically sets the cadence beeps for that rate for subsequent lengths.  This encourages you to hold an even tempo throughout your swim.  

Cadence mode can be combined with stroke rate feedback to give you the rate guidance beeps while you swim and then announce your actual stroke rate after each length.  This allows you to know how close you were to your target.  

Head Position*

Ever watch an elite swimmer swim and notice that they just “look different” in the water?  This is partly because they have great body position - i.e. they keep their head low in the water and their body and feet high.  Proper "head position" leads to proper body position and proper body position improves your stroke efficiency which can improve your speed.

It's difficult to feel and train yourself to keep proper head position.  Even if you know what to do, sometimes you just need a reminder.  Firebelly’s head position feature gives you immediate audio feedback on your head position every two strokes.  Additionally, you can setup a threshold mode that only turns on head position feedback when your head position exceeds a preset target.

*An additional feature license must be purchased for the head position feature on Firebelly.

 

The Firebelly App is a free mobile app for iOS and Android devices.  With the Firebelly App you can:

  • View detailed swim performance data from your workout, such as time per length, stroke count, and stroke rate
  • Email a spreadsheet with the detailed workout data to yourself, your coach, or others 
  • Configure feedback modes such as how often to hear split times, stroke count, stroke rate, distance, etc.
  • Manage the device, e.g. view the battery & memory levels, update the device software, and delete old workout data

 

Masters Swimmers and Triathletes

Masters swimmers and triathletes are motivated to improve their performance and want to stay motivated.  Often times they train on their own which can be challenging.

Unique Challenges:

  • It's not easy to get performance feedback on your own
  • It's easy for your mind to wander without the help of a coach or teammates there to keep you focused on the swim
  • Consistency often suffers or you fall into a slow pace or settle for sub-par technique
  • It is difficult to improve stroke technique without feedback

Firebelly Solution:

  • Firebelly’s immediate feedback keeps you on track and makes you aware of key swim performance metrics such as split times, stroke rate, head position and more
  • Data is stored on the device and can be recalled later to track workouts, see improvements, and get motivated for change
  • Stored data can be shared with a coach for remotely coached athletes

Race Pace Training

Going race pace means hitting precise target times and specific stroke rates. It’s hard to get the value and the benefit out of your training if you don’t know if you are hitting your targets.

Unique Challenges: 

  • It's difficult, especially with large teams, for coaches to give time feedback to each of their swimmers (and swimmers don't always get their own times)
  • Swimmers without an on deck coach often have to time each other or get the best accuracy they can on their own with the pace clock
  • Stroke rate is difficult to measure (requires someone on deck with a stopwatch); coaches can only get stroke rate for one or two swimmers on occasion
  • If you don’t train it in practice your body and mind won’t know how to do it in a race

Firebelly Solution: 

  • Firebelly provides the accuracy you need to know if you are hitting your targets or need to adjust (typically as accurate as stopwatch times)
  • Firebelly gives you a full picture of your swim – not just time, but also stroke count & stroke rate so you can tell if you are matching your race goals in practice
  • Firebelly detects your actual start so it doesn’t matter exactly when you leave

Test Set Tracking

Test sets give swimmers the opportunity to measure their training and fitness in a practice setting.  By repeating a particular test set throughout the season, progress can be tracked and adjustments can be made to the swimmer's training.

Unique Challenges: 

  • Tracking swimmer progress on test sets often requires juggling stop watches and log books (and water and paper are not compatible!)
  • Swimmers without an on deck coach often have to time each other or get the best accuracy they can using the pace clock

​Firebelly Solution: 

  • Firebelly allows you to track your performance so that you can compare a series of test set results, look for improvement, and determine if training adjustments are needed
  • Motivate your swimmers by comparing to past test set performance; analyze the data to identify areas for improvement
  • Firebelly tracks your workout data history enabling you to look for improvement opportunities

Example of test set data captured by Firebelly:

 

Firebelly was designed to be as seamless and in the background to your swimming as your goggles or swimsuit.  Many people who use it say they forget it is there (until it talks to them!). Here’s a look at some specific differences from other swim technology products.

Earbuds:

Earbuds fall out or your ears fill up with water and then it sounds like the audio is, well, underwater

Firebelly uses bone conduction audio which is always crystal clear even when you have water in your ears

Putting device on:

Goggle strap mounts are confusing to use, don’t allow for quick on/off for a particular set, and don’t allow for device sharing in a team environment

Firebelly has no clips, straps, or wires; it easily slides into place – taking less than 20 seconds to go from gear bag to feedback

Type of feedback:

Humans process audio information up to 10x faster than visual information

Firebelly gives audio feedback; it is seamless to your workout and is easy to understand and use when you are swimming hard

Swim watches:

Swim watches require you to push buttons at the start & finish to get your times; the screen is difficult to see through foggy goggles and there is no feedback during your swim

Firebelly gives feedback that is seamless to your workout; you get feedback without breaking stroke allowing you to practice the way you want to race, not how the tool makes you swim

Tempo training beeps:

Tempo training beepers provide rate guidance but there is no feedback on how close or far you actually are from your target; additionally beeps continue even when you aren’t swimming which is distracting at best and can cause you to miss important feedback from your coach

Firebelly provides tempo training beeps, but also gives you your actual times and actual stroke rates; its cadence mode starts & stops when you do and can be setup to turn on for even lengths and off for odd lengths to build muscle memory faster rather than becoming dependent on the device

 

What's Included
Firebelly swim performance monitor
USB charging cable 
Quick start guide

Sensors & Components
3-axis accelerometer, gyrometer, and magnetometer
Over 800 data points per second captured and analyzed
Bone conduction audio transducer

Battery and Power
Lithium-polymer rechargeable battery
Battery life up to 6 hours of swimming time
Charge time: 1 hour or less depending on charge level

Wireless Connectivity
Bluetooth Classic + Bluetooth LE
Wireless sync with iOS and Android smart devices

Memory
Record detailed data about every length of every workout: split times, stroke count, stroke rate, total times, and distances
Store 1M+ yards/meters of workout data

Waterproof
3 meters depth

Materials
Case is made of durable polycarbonate plastic
Buttons and goggle strap channel are made of flexible TPU plastic

Mobile App Software
Free Mobile App available for iOS and Android devices
Bluetooth is used to retrieve stored workout data and configure custom modes

Firebelly has already been produced in small quantities and is being used by swimmers and teams across the US.  With your help we will scale production and let more people in on the Firebelly phenomenon.

Note that due to the certifications required to sell in each country, Firebelly is only available in the USA for now.  If you live outside the US and are interested in Firebelly, please contact us and we will note your interest and keep you up to date as to when we are able to obtain the certification required for your country.

 

 

The "Father of Firebelly”

I have been a lifelong competitive swimmer and have a great passion for the sport.  I also have been involved with technology for most of my life.  Firebelly represents a combination of those two passions.  More importantly developing Firebelly was a chance for me to give something back to the sport that I love.

I truly hope that Firebelly is a useful training & coaching tool and helps you improve your swimming.  I also hope if you are new to swimming that Firebelly will deepen your enjoyment of the sport, or if you’ve been involved forever like me, that it adds a new dimension to your swimming and reinforces your passion.

The Firebelly device you see today is the result of over 3 years of research and development.  I’m committed to delivering your Firebelly to you and hope it earns a place in your swim gear bag and becomes a regular & useful part of your swim training.

- Matt Keller

 

How do I get started?
It's easy – just turn on your Firebelly device by pressing the top button once, put the device in place under your goggle strap or cap (wherever it is comfortable for you) and press the top button again to put the device into swim detect mode.  Then just swim and start hearing helpful performance feedback.


Do I have to hit the stop button every time I stop at the wall?
Nope! Once the unit is turned on simply hit the top button once to put the device into swim detect mode. Once in swim detect mode, all detection of starting, stopping, rest periods, etc. is automatic.


How does Firebelly determine my time?
Firebelly has the same type of advanced 3D sensors as a smartphone and can determine when you start, stop, and turn based on your motions.  It then determines the time between these swim events.
 

Do I need to change the way I swim or turn?
No. The device is designed to recognize the four competitive swim strokes and either flip or open turns.
 

What is bone conduction audio?
With bone conduction audio the sound bypasses your ear canal and is transmitted directly through your skull to your inner ear. In this way you can hear even when your ears are plugged with water.
 

Is bone conduction audio safe?
Yes. Bone conduction audio is actually the primary way in which you hear yourself talk and is why you think your voice sounds different when you listen to a recording of yourself. In some ways it is safer than audio through the ear canal where high volumes can damage your hearing.
 

Is the Firebelly device compatible with my goggles?
Very likely - the goggle strap slot is wide enough to accommodate most size goggle straps and either single or double straps.  You can also wear the device under your swim cap instead of under the goggle strap.
 

How long does the battery last?
A full charge will last 6+ hours of swimming time depending on the frequency of audio feedback (more frequent feedback reduces the battery life).
 

Do I ever need to replace the battery?
The Firebelly device has a rechargeable lithium polymer battery that is designed to last the lifetime of the device.
 

How much swim data can the device store?
The device can store over 1 million yards/meters worth of swim data. We hope you fill it up quickly!
 

Does the device work with the app while swimming?
The device is designed to be self-contained in the pool. Configured modes are quickly accessible with a couple of button clicks and all of the workout data is being stored on the device for later review from a smart app.
 

Can the device be used by more than one person?
Yes, although the workout data stored on the device and is displayed in the Firebelly App by date and time and not user.
 

How do I view the swim workout data?
The Firebelly App is used to view the workout data after the workout is completed. The App pairs with the device using Bluetooth and retrieves & displays the data.
 

What swim information can I view with the app?
The Firebelly App workout data viewer allows you to drill down into each repeat to view times, stroke count, and stroke rate for each length of your workout. Additionally, you can filter these to view 50 or 100 splits.
 

Can the device software be updated?
Yes. As new features and bug fixes become available the Firebelly App can be used to update the device software.
 

Why is it called Firebelly?
We believe the motivational aspect of the product is very important and wanted to capture it right in the product name.  We hope Firebelly will fuel the "fire in your belly" and help you achieve your swimming goals!

Firebelly has already been through an initial round of production and is in use by a number of swimmers and coaches around the country.  We expect the Indiegogo campaign will help finance some equipment needed to scale up production and will also get Firebelly into the hands of more people.


The biggest risk to production that we foresee at the moment is the potential for part shortages.  The electronics semiconductor industry currently has high demand and capacity constraints that may affect the availability of some parts required to produce Firebelly.

 

We hope you decide to join the Firebelly Family.  Please help spread the word about Firebelly to your swimming and coaching friends & family.

Good luck with your swimming adventures!

The Firebelly Team

Instant Feedback: Make real-time adjustments with instant performance feedback via bone conduction audio

Review Data: Analyze performance data, track your progress, and identify opportunities for improvement with the free smartphone app
Whether you are a beginner or an advanced swimmer, Firebelly was made for you.  It has no wires, no earbuds, no buttons to fumble with, no trying to see a small screen through foggy goggles.  Just hit a button, swim, and get crystal clear audio feedback to fuel better performance and help you achieve your swimming goals. Better Feedback.  Better Swimmers. *Requires purchase of Head Position feature  The free Firebelly App is available for iOS and Android.  The app uses Bluetooth to pair with the device in order to view workout data and program custom feedback modes.  Swim data that can be viewed in the app includes:
Total Time
Splits (per per 25, 50, 100)
Cumulative time
Stroke Count per length (SC)
Stroke Rate per length (SR)
 “No matter what mode I tune it to, it tells me the same thing: ‘Go Faster!’”“It provides a self-kick in the ass”“I don’t go to the pool to go through the motions. This alerts me if I’m falling off and gets me back on track.”“Helps me swim faster”“Keeps me honest”“For 20 swimmers you would need more than a dozen stopwatches to give all of the feedback that Firebelly can give those swimmers” Some Firebelly Fans:  Firebelly was designed to be as seamless to integrate with your workout as a pair of fins or a pull buoy.  With its easy to use design Firebelly can go from your equipment bag to ready to give swim feedback in less than 20 seconds.  Modes are set up to allow you to select the type of feedback you’d like to receive; e.g. time, stroke count, stroke rate, etc. The type of feedback can be selected based on the training goal of the set or workout.Firebelly's sensors collect over 800 data points each second and advanced algorithms are tuned to detect swimming-specific movements.  Bone conduction audio assures that you can hear the swimming feedback in the water by bypassing the ear canal and conducting audio through the cranial bones directly to your inner ear.  Swim performance data is stored on the device during your workout and can be viewed with the free mobile app.    Firebelly is easy to use and can unlock your potential and help you achieve your swimming goals. Time Firebelly automatically gives you highly accurate times while you swim.  You can select which splits you want to hear (e.g. each length or every other length for longer swims).  It also announces your total time at the end of each swim.  Hearing your splits and times lets you know if you are on track and helps you lock in your sense of pace.Stroke Count & Stroke RateStroke count and stroke rate are both important measures of swimming efficiency and are key to swimming fast.  Firebelly automatically detects the type of stroke you are swimming and counts the number of strokes you take per length.  Firebelly calculates and announces your stroke rate in either seconds per cycle or cycles per minute depending on your preference.  CadenceCadence mode on Firebelly provides stroke rate guidance with traditional tempo training "beeps" which, unlike a traditional tempo trainer, start & stop when you do.  Firebelly also provides advanced cadence features.  The device can be configured to provide cadence beeps only on the odd lengths allowing you to get a sense of swimming with the rate guidance and then trying to hold the rate on your own.  Another option provides a learning mode where Firebelly detects your stroke rate on the first length and automatically sets the cadence beeps for that rate for subsequent lengths.  This encourages you to hold an even tempo throughout your swim.  Cadence mode can be combined with stroke rate feedback to give you the rate guidance beeps while you swim and then announce your actual stroke rate after each length.  This allows you to know how close you were to your target.  Head Position*Ever watch an elite swimmer swim and notice that they just “look different” in the water?  This is partly because they have great body position - i.e. they keep their head low in the water and their body and feet high.  Proper "head position" leads to proper body position and proper body position improves your stroke efficiency which can improve your speed.It's difficult to feel and train yourself to keep proper head position.  Even if you know what to do, sometimes you just need a reminder.  Firebelly’s head position feature gives you immediate audio feedback on your head position every two strokes.  Additionally, you can setup a threshold mode that only turns on head position feedback when your head position exceeds a preset target.*An additional feature license must be purchased for the head position feature on Firebelly. The Firebelly App is a free mobile app for iOS and Android devices.  With the Firebelly App you can:
View detailed swim performance data from your workout, such as time per length, stroke count, and stroke rate
Email a spreadsheet with the detailed workout data to yourself, your coach, or others 
Configure feedback modes such as how often to hear split times, stroke count, stroke rate, distance, etc.
Manage the device, e.g. view the battery & memory levels, update the device software, and delete old workout data
 Masters Swimmers and TriathletesMasters swimmers and triathletes are motivated to improve their performance and want to stay motivated.  Often times they train on their own which can be challenging.Unique Challenges:
It's not easy to get performance feedback on your own
It's easy for your mind to wander without the help of a coach or teammates there to keep you focused on the swim
Consistency often suffers or you fall into a slow pace or settle for sub-par technique
It is difficult to improve stroke technique without feedback
Firebelly Solution:
Firebelly’s immediate feedback keeps you on track and makes you aware of key swim performance metrics such as split times, stroke rate, head position and more
Data is stored on the device and can be recalled later to track workouts, see improvements, and get motivated for change
Stored data can be shared with a coach for remotely coached athletes
Race Pace TrainingGoing race pace means hitting precise target times and specific stroke rates. It’s hard to get the value and the benefit out of your training if you don’t know if you are hitting your targets.Unique Challenges: 
It's difficult, especially with large teams, for coaches to give time feedback to each of their swimmers (and swimmers don't always get their own times)
Swimmers without an on deck coach often have to time each other or get the best accuracy they can on their own with the pace clock
Stroke rate is difficult to measure (requires someone on deck with a stopwatch); coaches can only get stroke rate for one or two swimmers on occasion
If you don’t train it in practice your body and mind won’t know how to do it in a race
Firebelly Solution: 
Firebelly provides the accuracy you need to know if you are hitting your targets or need to adjust (typically as accurate as stopwatch times)
Firebelly gives you a full picture of your swim – not just time, but also stroke count & stroke rate so you can tell if you are matching your race goals in practice
Firebelly detects your actual start so it doesn’t matter exactly when you leave
Test Set TrackingTest sets give swimmers the opportunity to measure their training and fitness in a practice setting.  By repeating a particular test set throughout the season, progress can be tracked and adjustments can be made to the swimmer's training.Unique Challenges: 
Tracking swimmer progress on test sets often requires juggling stop watches and log books (and water and paper are not compatible!)
Swimmers without an on deck coach often have to time each other or get the best accuracy they can using the pace clock
​Firebelly Solution: 
Firebelly allows you to track your performance so that you can compare a series of test set results, look for improvement, and determine if training adjustments are needed
Motivate your swimmers by comparing to past test set performance; analyze the data to identify areas for improvement
Firebelly tracks your workout data history enabling you to look for improvement opportunities
Example of test set data captured by Firebelly: Firebelly was designed to be as seamless and in the background to your swimming as your goggles or swimsuit.  Many people who use it say they forget it is there (until it talks to them!). Here’s a look at some specific differences from other swim technology products.Earbuds:Earbuds fall out or your ears fill up with water and then it sounds like the audio is, well, underwaterFirebelly uses bone conduction audio which is always crystal clear even when you have water in your earsPutting device on:Goggle strap mounts are confusing to use, don’t allow for quick on/off for a particular set, and don’t allow for device sharing in a team environmentFirebelly has no clips, straps, or wires; it easily slides into place – taking less than 20 seconds to go from gear bag to feedbackType of feedback:Humans process audio information up to 10x faster than visual informationFirebelly gives audio feedback; it is seamless to your workout and is easy to understand and use when you are swimming hardSwim watches:Swim watches require you to push buttons at the start & finish to get your times; the screen is difficult to see through foggy goggles and there is no feedback during your swimFirebelly gives feedback that is seamless to your workout; you get feedback without breaking stroke allowing you to practice the way you want to race, not how the tool makes you swimTempo training beeps:Tempo training beepers provide rate guidance but there is no feedback on how close or far you actually are from your target; additionally beeps continue even when you aren’t swimming which is distracting at best and can cause you to miss important feedback from your coachFirebelly provides tempo training beeps, but also gives you your actual times and actual stroke rates; its cadence mode starts & stops when you do and can be setup to turn on for even lengths and off for odd lengths to build muscle memory faster rather than becoming dependent on the device What's IncludedFirebelly swim performance monitorUSB charging cable Quick start guideSensors & Components3-axis accelerometer, gyrometer, and magnetometerOver 800 data points per second captured and analyzedBone conduction audio transducerBattery and PowerLithium-polymer rechargeable batteryBattery life up to 6 hours of swimming timeCharge time: 1 hour or less depending on charge levelWireless ConnectivityBluetooth Classic + Bluetooth LEWireless sync with iOS and Android smart devicesMemoryRecord detailed data about every length of every workout: split times, stroke count, stroke rate, total times, and distancesStore 1M+ yards/meters of workout dataWaterproof3 meters depthMaterialsCase is made of durable polycarbonate plasticButtons and goggle strap channel are made of flexible TPU plasticMobile App SoftwareFree Mobile App available for iOS and Android devicesBluetooth is used to retrieve stored workout data and configure custom modesFirebelly has already been produced in small quantities and is being used by swimmers and teams across the US.  With your help we will scale production and let more people in on the Firebelly phenomenon.Note that due to the certifications required to sell in each country, Firebelly is only available in the USA for now.  If you live outside the US and are interested in Firebelly, please contact us and we will note your interest and keep you up to date as to when we are able to obtain the certification required for your country.  The "Father of Firebelly”I have been a lifelong competitive swimmer and have a great passion for the sport.  I also have been involved with technology for most of my life.  Firebelly represents a combination of those two passions.  More importantly developing Firebelly was a chance for me to give something back to the sport that I love.I truly hope that Firebelly is a useful training & coaching tool and helps you improve your swimming.  I also hope if you are new to swimming that Firebelly will deepen your enjoyment of the sport, or if you’ve been involved forever like me, that it adds a new dimension to your swimming and reinforces your passion.The Firebelly device you see today is the result of over 3 years of research and development.  I’m committed to delivering your Firebelly to you and hope it earns a place in your swim gear bag and becomes a regular & useful part of your swim training.- Matt Keller How do I get started?It's easy – just turn on your Firebelly device by pressing the top button once, put the device in place under your goggle strap or cap (wherever it is comfortable for you) and press the top button again to put the device into swim detect mode.  Then just swim and start hearing helpful performance feedback.Do I have to hit the stop button every time I stop at the wall?Nope! Once the unit is turned on simply hit the top button once to put the device into swim detect mode. Once in swim detect mode, all detection of starting, stopping, rest periods, etc. is automatic.How does Firebelly determine my time?Firebelly has the same type of advanced 3D sensors as a smartphone and can determine when you start, stop, and turn based on your motions.  It then determines the time between these swim events. Do I need to change the way I swim or turn?No. The device is designed to recognize the four competitive swim strokes and either flip or open turns. What is bone conduction audio?With bone conduction audio the sound bypasses your ear canal and is transmitted directly through your skull to your inner ear. In this way you can hear even when your ears are plugged with water. Is bone conduction audio safe?Yes. Bone conduction audio is actually the primary way in which you hear yourself talk and is why you think your voice sounds different when you listen to a recording of yourself. In some ways it is safer than audio through the ear canal where high volumes can damage your hearing. Is the Firebelly device compatible with my goggles?Very likely - the goggle strap slot is wide enough to accommodate most size goggle straps and either single or double straps.  You can also wear the device under your swim cap instead of under the goggle strap. How long does the battery last?A full charge will last 6+ hours of swimming time depending on the frequency of audio feedback (more frequent feedback reduces the battery life). Do I ever need to replace the battery?The Firebelly device has a rechargeable lithium polymer battery that is designed to last the lifetime of the device. How much swim data can the device store?The device can store over 1 million yards/meters worth of swim data. We hope you fill it up quickly! Does the device work with the app while swimming?The device is designed to be self-contained in the pool. Configured modes are quickly accessible with a couple of button clicks and all of the workout data is being stored on the device for later review from a smart app. Can the device be used by more than one person?Yes, although the workout data stored on the device and is displayed in the Firebelly App by date and time and not user. How do I view the swim workout data?The Firebelly App is used to view the workout data after the workout is completed. The App pairs with the device using Bluetooth and retrieves & displays the data. What swim information can I view with the app?The Firebelly App workout data viewer allows you to drill down into each repeat to view times, stroke count, and stroke rate for each length of your workout. Additionally, you can filter these to view 50 or 100 splits. Can the device software be updated?Yes. As new features and bug fixes become available the Firebelly App can be used to update the device software. Why is it called Firebelly?We believe the motivational aspect of the product is very important and wanted to capture it right in the product name.  We hope Firebelly will fuel the "fire in your belly" and help you achieve your swimming goals!Firebelly has already been through an initial round of production and is in use by a number of swimmers and coaches around the country.  We expect the Indiegogo campaign will help finance some equipment needed to scale up production and will also get Firebelly into the hands of more people.The biggest risk to production that we foresee at the moment is the potential for part shortages.  The electronics semiconductor industry currently has high demand and capacity constraints that may affect the availability of some parts required to produce Firebelly. We hope you decide to join the Firebelly Family.  Please help spread the word about Firebelly to your swimming and coaching friends & family.Good luck with your swimming adventures!The Firebelly Team

story:
My Name is Carol Stern and I am asking you to help save my husbands life. Gary is a good man. He has always been kind and generous to all. He has lost most of his colon and intestins. He has had multiple surgerys and he keeps leaking waist inside of his body. They can't even close up his insision, his abdomen has been left open for almost a year now. He is in sever condition and slipping away from us for over a year now. He has a chance to pull through if we can get his strength back in the next 6 months. However after multiple trips and being transported back and forth to diffrent hospitals. We no longer have the founds to pay for his medical care.

It's been over a year now and I still sit by his side. Taking care of him like a nurse the way anywife would. I have been watching him suffer as heslowly slips away. I try my best to put on a positive and strong front for him. When I am out of his sight, I have overwhelming felings of despair as I cry silent tears.

I feel as if I am o an emotional roller coaster ride with no heights of joy or happiness. I am stuch on it. neither in control or able to get off. It just speeds along at 100miles an hr. Twisting and tturning to and fro from sadness to anger and through the tunnel of despair. I am trying my best to keep my faith and find the smallest ray of hope shine through the darkness. Yet even in the light of day the darkness consumes me.

The medical bills have depleted all of our savings and we have been informed that he has depleted his Medicaid; we must come up with over $19,000. before Medicaid will coveranymore. Our finances are exhausted as his bills are over $1,500,000. and we have been notified that we will be losing our home. Social Security has denied him Medicare.

I have written letters to politicians including the Governor of Maryland, Congressmen, Senators and even the President of the United States. All of which have gone unanswered. I have also tried to seek organizations and the media or whatever help I could get. They have all turned a blind eye.

I have been pleading with my husband not to go gently into that good night. However, this could be out of our hands, as just one of his medications whch gives him his nutrition, cost about $3,000. a week and he only has one week left of it.

My heart and soul are exhausted from screaming in silence. At times I feel guilty for thinking about my own suffering when it is my sweet darling husband which has been my strength, my hope, my protector and my love which is lying there suffering as he sorries not about his own fait, but he worries about what will happen to me.

God Bless Carol Stern.

story:
Short Summary

My Dad, Dave Caisse passed away almost 10 years ago.
He was 46 years old.
He left behind a loving wife of 19 years and two daughters
aged 17 and 14.
He never got to see them graduate, walk them down the aisle or meet his grandchildren.
 
He was never sick a day in his life.
 
He was diagnosed with brain cancer in april 2002. He died that same year in the fall.
He was strong, he was brave....he was a hero.
 
Cancer is a terrible thing...it takes way too many lives. It took my dad.
 
Now as I sit here 10 years later, I want his memory to live on.
I want  his name to mean something......because he meant the world to me.
 
 
So, this August, Im organizing an event, in his name to raise money for those just like him....
the hard working, fun, loving, honest, generous human beings that should not be victims of this terrible disease.
 
Any donations will go to the Wilmont Cancer Center at Strong in hopes to help someone like my dad, to fund some research and hopefully help find a cure.
 
ANY donation is appreciated....EVERY little bit helps.
 
Spread the word...and help keep my dad's memory alive....and help KILL CANCER!
 
 
 
Donations via credit card/paypal may be made by clicking the button to the right.
Checks made payable to "Kelly Rasmusson" can be sent to 2932 Church Rd Hamlin NY 14464
with "Dave Caisse" in the memo section
 
Again, Thank You.
